trans-unit.source: WebRTC connectivity
trans-unit.target: WebRTC连接

trans-unit.source: WebRTC consists of several interrelated APIs and protocols which work together to achieve this. The documentation you'll find here will help you understand the fundamentals of WebRTC, how to set up and use both data and media connections, and more.
trans-unit.target: WebRTC由多个相互关联的API和协议组成,这些API和协议共同工作以实现这一目标。你在这里找到的文档将帮助你了解WebRTC的基本原理,如何设置和使用数据和媒体连接等。

trans-unit.source: WebRTC data channels (see RTCDataChannel.onmessage).
trans-unit.target: WebRTC数据通道（请参阅 RTCDataChannel.onmessage ）。

trans-unit.source: WebRTC data channels support buffering of outbound data. This is handled automatically. While there's no way to control the size of the buffer, you can learn how much data is currently buffered, and you can choose to be notified by an event when the buffer starts to run low on queued data. This makes it easy to write efficient routines that make sure there's always data ready to send without over-using memory or swamping the channel completely.
trans-unit.target: WebRTC数据通道支持出站数据的缓冲。这是自动处理的。虽然没有办法控制缓冲区的大小,但你可以了解当前有多少数据被缓冲,并且你可以选择在缓冲区开始运行低队列数据时通过事件通知。这使得编写高效的例程变得很容易,确保总是有数据可以发送,而不会过度使用内存或完全淹没通道。

trans-unit.source: WebRTC doesn't send DTMF codes as audio data. Instead, they're sent out-of-band, as RTP payloads. Note, however, that although it's possible to send DTMF using WebRTC, there is currently no way to detect or receive incoming DTMF. WebRTC currently ignores these payloads; this is because WebRTC's DTMF support is primarily intended for use with legacy telephone services that rely on DTMF tones to perform tasks such as:
trans-unit.target: WebRTC不会将DTMF代码作为音频数据发送。而是将它们作为RTP有效负载带外发送。但是请注意，尽管可以使用WebRTC 发送 DTMF，但目前尚无法检测或接收传入的 DTMF。WebRTC当前忽略这些有效载荷；这是因为WebRTC的DTMF支持主要用于与依赖DTMF音调执行以下任务的旧式电话服务一起使用：

trans-unit.source: WebRTC interfaces
trans-unit.target: WebRTC接口

trans-unit.source: WebRTC lets you build peer-to-peer communication of arbitrary data, audio, or video—or any combination thereof—into a browser application. In this article, we'll look at the lifetime of a WebRTC session, from establishing the connection all the way through closing the connection when it's no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: WebRTC使您可以将任意数据，音频或视频（或其任意组合）的对等通信构建到浏览器应用程序中。在本文中，我们将研究WebRTC会话的生命周期，从一直建立连接到不再需要连接时关闭它。

trans-unit.source: WebRTC serves multiple purposes, and overlaps substantially with the Media Capture and Streams API. Together, they provide powerful multimedia capabilities to the Web, including support for audio and video conferencing, file exchange, identity management, and interfacing with legacy telephone systems by sending DTMF signals. Connections between peers can be made without requiring any special drivers or plug-ins, and can often be made without any intermediary servers.
trans-unit.target: WebRTC具有多种用途，并且与Media Capture and Streams API基本上重叠。它们共同为Web提供了强大的多媒体功能，包括支持音频和视频会议，文件交换，身份管理以及通过发送DTMF信号与旧式电话系统进行接口。对等点之间的连接可以不需要任何特殊的驱动程序或插件，并且通常可以在没有任何中间服务器的情况下进行。

trans-unit.source: WebRTC's support for interacting with gateways that link to old-school telephone systems includes support for sending DTMF tones using the RTCDTMFSender interface. This guide shows how to do so.
trans-unit.target: WebRTC对与链接到老式电话系统的网关进行交互的支持包括对使用 RTCDTMFSender 接口发送DTMF音频的支持。本指南说明了如何进行。

trans-unit.source: WebRTC-proper protocols
trans-unit.target: WebRTC-per协议

trans-unit.source: WebSocket
trans-unit.target: WebSocket

trans-unit.source: WebSocket API Specification
trans-unit.target: WebSocket API规范

trans-unit.source: WebSocket client applications use the WebSocket API to communicate with WebSocket servers over the WebSocket protocol.
trans-unit.target: WebSocket客户端应用程序使用WebSocket API通过WebSocket协议与WebSocket服务器进行通信。

trans-unit.source: WebSocket codes, extensions, subprotocols, etc. are registered at the IANA WebSocket Protocol Registry.
trans-unit.target: WebSocket代码，扩展名，子协议等在IANA WebSocket协议注册表中注册。

trans-unit.source: WebSocket codes, extensions, subprotocols, etc. are registered at the IANA WebSocket Protocol Registry.

WebSocket extensions and subprotocols are negotiated via headers during the handshake. Sometimes extensions and subprotocols seem too similar to be different things, but there is a clear distinction. Extensions control the WebSocket frame and modify the payload, while subprotocols structure the WebSocket payload and never modify anything. Extensions are optional and generalized (like compression); subprotocols are mandatory and localized (like ones for chat and for MMORPG games).
trans-unit.target: WebSocket扩展和子协议在握手过程中通过头协商。有时，扩展名和子协议看起来太相似，以至于不能成为不同的事物，但是有明显的区别。扩展控制WebSocket 框架并修改有效负载，而子协议构成WebSocket 有效负载，并且从不修改任何内容。扩展是可选的和通用的（如压缩）；子协议是强制性的且已本地化（例如用于聊天和MMORPG游戏的子协议）。

trans-unit.source: WebSockets communicate over a TCP (Transmission Control Protocol) connection. Java's ServerSocket class is located in the java.net package.
trans-unit.target: WebSocket通过TCP（传输控制协议）连接进行通信。Java的ServerSocket类位于java.net包中。

trans-unit.source: WebSockets communicate over a TCP (Transmission Control Protocol) connection. Luckily, C# has a TcpListener class which does as the name suggests. It is in the System.Net.Sockets namespace.
trans-unit.target: WebSocket通过TCP（传输控制协议）连接进行通信。幸运的是，C＃有一个TcpListener类，顾名思义，它可以执行此操作。它在System.Net.Sockets命名空间中。

trans-unit.source: WebSockets communicate over a TCP (Transmission Control Protocol) connection. Java's ServerSocket class is located in the java.net package.
WebSockets communicate over a TCP (Transmission Control Protocol) connection. Luckily, C# has a TcpListener class which does as the name suggests. It is in the System.Net.Sockets namespace.
WebSockets is an event-driven API; when messages are received, a "message" event is delivered to the onmessage function. To begin listening for incoming data, you can do something like this:
trans-unit.target: WebSockets是事件驱动的API。当收到消息时，“消息”事件将传递到 onmessage 函数。要开始侦听传入的数据，您可以执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: WebSockets should not be used in a mixed content environment; that is, you shouldn't open a non-secure WebSocket connection from a page loaded using HTTPS or vice-versa. In fact, some browsers explicitly forbid this, including Firefox 8 and later.
trans-unit.target: WebSockets 不应在混合内容环境中使用;也就是说,您不应该从使用 HTTPS 加载的页面打开非安全的 WebSocket 连接,反之亦然。事实上,一些浏览器明确禁止这样做,包括 Firefox 8 和更新版本。

trans-unit.source: WebSockets support in Firefox is continuing to track the evolving WebSocket specification. Firefox 6 implements version 7 of the underlying protocol, while Firefox 7 implements version 8 (as specified by IETF draft 10). Firefox mobile received WebSocket support in Firefox mobile 7.0.
trans-unit.target: Firefox 中的 WebSockets 支持继续跟踪不断发展的 WebSocket 规范。Firefox 6 实现了底层协议的第 7 版,而 Firefox 7 实现了第 8 版(由 IETF 草案 10 规定)。Firefox移动版在Firefox移动版7.0中获得了WebSocket支持。

trans-unit.source: WebVR provides support for exposing virtual reality devices — for example head-mounted displays like the Oculus Rift or HTC Vive — to web apps, enabling developers to translate position and movement information from the display into movement around a 3D scene. This has numerous, interesting applications, from virtual product tours and interactive training apps to immersive first person games.
trans-unit.target: WebVR提供了将虚拟现实设备（例如Oculus Rift或HTC Vive等头戴式显示器）暴露于Web应用程序的支持，从而使开发人员能够将显示器的位置和运动信息转换为围绕3D场景的运动。它具有众多有趣的应用程序，从虚拟产品游览和交互式培训应用程序到身临其境的第一人称游戏。

trans-unit.source: WebVR's dedicated VRDisplay.requestAnimationFrame() method is used to run the app's rendering loop at the correct refresh rate for the display.
trans-unit.target: WebVR专用的 VRDisplay.requestAnimationFrame() 方法用于以正确的显示刷新率运行应用程序的渲染循环。

trans-unit.source: WebVR's dedicated VRDisplay.requestAnimationFrame() method is used to run the app's rendering loop at the correct refresh rate for the display.

trans-unit.source: When CORS is in effect, many of the timing properties' values are returned as zero unless the server's access policy permits these values to be shared. This requires the server providing the resource to send the Timing-Allow-Origin HTTP response header with a value specifying the origin or origins which are allowed to get the restricted timestamp values.
trans-unit.target: 当CORS生效时，许多的定时属性的值，除非服务器的访问策略允许要被共享这些值返回为零。这要求服务器提供资源以发送 Timing-Allow-Origin HTTP响应标头，并提供一个值，该值指定允许获得受限时间戳值的一个或多个起源。

trans-unit.source: When CORS is in effect, many of these values are returned as zero unless the server's access policy permits these values to be shared. This requires the server providing the resource to send the Timing-Allow-Origin HTTP response header with a value specifying the origin or origins which are allowed to get the restricted timestamp values.
trans-unit.target: 当CORS生效时，许多这些值，除非服务器的访问策略允许共享这些值返回为零。这要求服务器提供资源以发送 Timing-Allow-Origin HTTP响应标头，并提供一个值，该值指定允许获得受限时间戳值的一个或多个起源。

trans-unit.source: When MediaRecorder.requestData() is called, all media data which has been captured since recording began or the last time a dataavailable event occurred is delivered; then a new Blob is created and media capture continues into that blob.
trans-unit.target: 调用 MediaRecorder.requestData() 时，将传递自录制开始或上次发生数据 dataavailable 事件以来捕获的所有媒体数据；然后创建一个新的 Blob ，并将媒体捕获继续到该Blob中。

trans-unit.source: When MediaRecorder.stop() is called, all media data which has been captured since recording began or the last time a dataavailable event occurred is delivered in a Blob; after this, capturing ends.
trans-unit.target: 当 MediaRecorder.stop() 被调用，因为记录开始或最后一次已捕获的所有媒体数据 dataavailable 事件发生在交付 Blob ; 此后，捕获结束。

trans-unit.source: When click() is used with supported elements (such as an <input>), it fires the element's click event. This event then bubbles up to elements higher in the document tree (or event chain) and fires their click events.
trans-unit.target: 当 click() 与支持的元素（例如 <input> ）一起使用时，它将触发元素的click事件。然后，此事件冒泡到文档树（或事件链）中较高的元素，并触发其单击事件。

trans-unit.source: When createOffer() succeeds (fulfilling the promise), we pass the created offer information into myPeerConnection.setLocalDescription(), which configures the connection and media configuration state for the caller's end of the connection.
trans-unit.target: 当 createOffer() 成功（履行承诺）后，我们将创建的商品信息传递到 myPeerConnection.setLocalDescription() ，该信息为调用者的连接端配置连接和媒体配置状态。

trans-unit.source: When deleteDatabase() is called, any other open connections to this particular database will get a versionchange event.
trans-unit.target: 当 deleteDatabase() 被调用时，这个特定的数据库的任何其他打开的连接将获得versionchange事件。

trans-unit.source: When getData() is run, we create a new request using the Request() constructor, then use it to fetch a specific .txt file. When the fetch is successful, we read a USVString (text) object out of the response using text(), then set the innerHTML of the <article> element equal to the text object.
trans-unit.target: 当 getData() 运行时，我们创建一个使用一个新的请求 Request() 构造函数，然后用它来获取特定 .txt 文件。当抓取成功，我们读取 USVString （文本）对象出响应使用的 text() 然后设置 innerHTML 所述的 <article> 元素等于所述文本对象。

trans-unit.source: When key 2 is pressed, another keydown event is fired for this new key press, and the key property value for the event is set to be the string "@" for the U.S keyboard type and """ for the UK keyboard type, because of the active modifier shift key. The beforeinput and input events are fired next because a character key has been produced. As we keep holding the key, the keydown event continues to fire repeatedly and the KeyboardEvent.repeat property is set to true. The beforeinput and input events are fired repeatedly as well.
trans-unit.target: 当按下 key 2 ，此新的按键将触发另一个 keydown 事件，并且该事件的 key 属性值设置为对于美国键盘类型为字符串 "@" ，对于英国键盘类型为字符串 """ ，因为的活性改良剂 shift 键， beforeinput 和 input ，因为一个字符键已经产生的事件被解雇旁边，当我们按住该按钮时， keydown 事件继续反复点火， KeyboardEvent.repeat 属性设置为 true ，该 beforeinput 和 input 事件也会反复触发。

trans-unit.source: When key 2 is pressed, another keydown event is fired for this new key press, and the key property value for the event is set to the string "@" for the U.S keyboard type and """ for the UK keyboard type, because of the active modifier shift key. The beforeinput and input events are fired next because a character key has been produced.
trans-unit.target: 当按下 key 2 ，此新按键将触发另一个 keydown 事件，并且由于以下原因，该事件的 key 属性值设置为字符串 "@" 对于美国键盘类型为 """ ，对于英国键盘类型为“”“），原因是激活的修饰键 shift 键，因为已生成字符键，所以将触发 beforeinput 和 input 事件。

trans-unit.source: When nodeValue is defined to be null, setting it has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当 nodeValue 定义为 null 时，设置无效。

trans-unit.source: When observe() is called, the specified options are attributes and attributeOldValue, which means that changes to attribute values will be reported, and each mutation record will include the oldValue property specifying the attribute's previous value.
trans-unit.target: 当 observe() 被调用时，指定的选项是 attributes 和 attributeOldValue ，这意味着更改属性值将被报告，其中每个突变记录将包括 oldValue 属性指定属性的前值。

trans-unit.source: When observe() is called, the specified options include both attributeFilter and subtree, so that we monitor the attribute values for all of the nodes contained within the subtree rooted at the node with the ID "userlist". The attributeOldValue option is set to true because we want the prior value of the changed attributes recorded and reported in the mutation records we receive.
trans-unit.target: 当 observe() 被调用时，指定的选项包括 attributeFilter 和 subtree ，以使得我们监测的属性值对所有包含在与该ID的节点为根的子树内的节点的 "userlist" 。该 attributeOldValue 选项设置为 true ，因为我们要记录并在我们收到的突变记录报告的改变属性的先前值。

trans-unit.source: When true, containsNode() returns true when a part of the node is part of the selection. When false, containsNode() only returns true when the entire node is part of the selection. If not specified, the default value false is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则当节点的一部分是选择的一部分时， containsNode() 返回 true 。如果为 false ，则仅当整个节点是选择的一部分时， containsNode() 才返回 true 。如果未指定，则使用默认值 false 。

trans-unit.source: When true, enabled indicates that the track is permitted to render its actual media to the output. When enabled is set to false, the track only generates empty frames.
trans-unit.target: 为 true 时， enabled 表示允许轨道将其实际媒体呈现到输出。如果将 enabled 设置为 false ，则轨道只会生成空帧。

trans-unit.source: When Mozilla parses a document, it builds a content tree and then uses it to display the document.
trans-unit.target: 当Mozilla解析文档时,它会建立一个内容树,然后用它来显示文档。

trans-unit.source: When Pointer lock is enabled, the standard MouseEvent properties clientX, clientY, screenX, and screenY are held constant, as if the mouse is not moving. The movementX and movementY properties continue to provide the mouse's change in position. There is no limit to movementX and movementY values if the mouse is continuously moving in a single direction. The concept of the mouse cursor does not exist and the cursor cannot move off the window or be clamped by a screen edge.
trans-unit.target: 启用指针锁定后，标准的 MouseEvent 属性 clientX ， clientY ， screenX 和 screenY 保持不变，就好像鼠标没有移动一样。该 movementX 和 movementY 特性继续提供鼠标的位置变化。还有就是没有限制 movementX 和 movementY 值如果鼠标在单一方向上连续移动。鼠标光标的概念不存在，并且光标不能移出窗口或被屏幕边缘夹住。

trans-unit.source: When a "message" event occurs on the remote channel, our handleReceiveMessage() method is called as the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 当在远程通道上发生“消息”事件时，我们的 handleReceiveMessage() 方法称为事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: When a PresentationConnection object is created, its binaryType IDL attribute MUST be set to the string "arraybuffer". Upon getting, the attribute MUST return its most recent value (the value it was last set as). Upon setting, the user agent MUST set the IDL attribute to the new value.
trans-unit.target: 当 PresentationConnection 对象被创建，其 binaryType IDL属性必须被设定为字符串“ arraybuffer ”。获取后，属性务必返回其最新值（最后设置为的值）。设置后，用户代理务必将IDL属性设置为新值。

trans-unit.source: When a PresentationRequest is constructed, the given urlsMUST be used as the list of
trans-unit.target: 当 PresentationRequest 构造，在给定 urls 必须被用作列表

trans-unit.source: When a WebAuthn authenticator creates a new PublicKeyCredential via a create() call, the PublicKeyCredential.response value will be an AuthenticatorAttestationResponse object. This object contains two properties: 1) a clientDataJSON property inherited from AuthenticatorResponse; and 2) an attestationObject that is an authenticator's way of providing a root of trust for the newly created keypair.
trans-unit.target: 当WebAuthn身份验证器通过create（）调用创建新的PublicKeyCredential时， PublicKeyCredential.response 值将是AuthenticatorAttestationResponse对象。该对象包含两个属性：1）从AuthenticatorResponse继承的clientDataJSON属性； 2）一个证明对象，它是身份验证者为新创建的密钥对提供信任根的方式。

trans-unit.source: When a WebAuthn authenticator peforms an authentication via the get() call, the result is a new PublicKeyCredential, the PublicKeyCredential.response value will be an AuthenticatorAssertionResponse object. This object contains both the client data (i.e. - browser data) for the authentication as well as the data from the authenticator to cryptographically prove that the authentication is valid.
trans-unit.target: 当WebAuthn身份验证器通过get（）调用执行身份验证时，结果是一个新的PublicKeyCredential， PublicKeyCredential.response 值将是AuthenticatorAssertionResponse对象。该对象既包含用于身份验证的客户端数据（即浏览器数据），也包含来自身份验证器的数据，用于以密码方式证明身份验证有效。

trans-unit.target: 当 pointerdown 事件被激发，不同的功能取决于事件的价值称为 twist 属性。

trans-unit.source: When a MediaRecordingErrorEvent occurs, you can determine to some extent what went wrong by examining the error property within the MediaRecorderErrorEvent received by the MediaRecorder's error event handler, onerror.
trans-unit.target: 当 MediaRecordingErrorEvent 发生时，你可以决定在一定程度上通过什么检查出了错 error 属性中的 MediaRecorderErrorEvent 收到由 MediaRecorder 的 error 事件处理程序， onerror 的。

trans-unit.source: When a MediaSource object is played by an HTML media element, this property will return a TimeRanges object that contains the time ranges that the user is able to seek to.
trans-unit.target: 当HTML媒体元素播放 MediaSource 对象时，此属性将返回一个 TimeRanges 对象，其中包含用户可以搜索的时间范围。

trans-unit.source: When a JavaScript runtime error (including syntax errors and exceptions thrown within handlers) occurs, an error event using interface ErrorEvent is fired at window and window.onerror() is invoked (as well as handlers attached by window.addEventListener (not only capturing)).
trans-unit.target: 当发生JavaScript运行时错误（包括语法错误和在处理程序中引发的异常）时，在 window 和window上触发使用接口 ErrorEvent 的 error 事件，并调用 window.onerror() 以及 window.addEventListener 附加的处理程序（不仅捕获） ）。

trans-unit.source: When a PublicKeyCredential has been created with the create() call, it will include an AuthenticatorAttestationResponse. This is the authenticator's way of providing a cryptographic root of trust for the new key pair that has been generated.
trans-unit.target: 通过create（）调用创建 PublicKeyCredential时，它将包括AuthenticatorAttestationResponse。这是验证者为已生成的新密钥对提供加密信任根的方式。

trans-unit.source: When a PublicKeyCredential is the result of a get() call, it will include an AuthenticatorAssertionResponse. This is the authenticator's way of proving to a service that it has the key pair and that the authentication request is valid and approved.
trans-unit.target: 当publicKeyCredential是get（）调用的结果时，它将包括AuthenticatorAssertionResponse。这是验证方向服务证明其具有密钥对以及验证请求有效且已批准的方式。

trans-unit.source: When a binary message is received on the data channel, the resulting message event's MessageEvent.data property is an object of the type specified by the binaryType.
trans-unit.target: 在数据通道上接收到二进制消息时，结果 message 事件的 MessageEvent.data 属性是由 binaryType 指定的类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: When a buffer plays, you will hear the left most sample frame, and then the one right next to it, etc. In the case of stereo, you will hear both channels at the same time. Sample frames are very useful, because they are independent of the number of channels, and represent time, in a useful way for doing precise audio manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 当一个缓冲区播放时,你会听到最左边的采样帧,然后是紧挨着它的那个,等等。在立体声的情况下,你会同时听到两个通道的声音。采样帧是非常有用的,因为它们是独立于通道数的,并且代表了时间,对于做精确的音频操作是非常有用的。

trans-unit.source: When a button is pressed, the generation is stopped, the stream is closed using ReadableStreamDefaultController.close(), and another function is run, which reads the data back out of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 当按下按钮时，将停止生成，并使用 ReadableStreamDefaultController.close() 关闭流，然后运行另一个函数，该函数将从流中读取数据。

trans-unit.source: When a button is pressed, the generation is stopped, the stream is closed using ReadableStreamDefaultController.close(), and another function is run, which reads the data back out of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 当按下按钮时，将停止生成，并使用 ReadableStreamDefaultController.close() 关闭流，然后运行另一个函数，该函数将从流中读取数据。

trans-unit.source: When a button is pressed, the generation is stopped, the stream is closed using ReadableStreamDefaultController.close(), and another function is run, which reads the data back out of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 当按下按钮时，将停止生成，并使用 ReadableStreamDefaultController.close() 关闭流，然后运行另一个函数，该函数将从流中读取数据。

trans-unit.source: When a client connects to a server, it sends a GET request to upgrade the connection to a WebSocket from a simple HTTP request. This is known as handshaking.
trans-unit.target: 当客户端连接到服务器时,它会发送一个GET请求,将连接从简单的HTTP请求升级为WebSocket。这就是所谓的握手。

trans-unit.source: When a database is first created, its version is the integer 1. Each database has one version at a time; a database can't exist in multiple versions at once. The only way to change the version is by opening it with a greater version than the current one. This will start a versionchangetransaction and fire an upgradeneeded event. The only place where the schema of the database can be updated is inside the handler of that event.
trans-unit.target: 首次创建数据库时，它的版本是整数1。每个数据库一次都有一个版本。一个数据库不能一次存在多个版本。更改版本的唯一方法是打开比当前版本更大的版本。这将启动版本 versionchange 事务并触发需要 upgradeneeded 事件。可以更新数据库架构的唯一位置是该事件的处理程序内。

trans-unit.source: When a drag occurs, a translucent image is generated from the drag target (the element the "dragstart" event is fired at), and follows the mouse pointer during the drag. This image is created automatically, so you do not need to create it yourself. However, you can use setDragImage() to specify a custom drag feedback image.
trans-unit.target: 发生拖动时，将从拖动目标生成半透明图像（触发“ dragstart ”事件的元素），并在拖动期间跟随鼠标指针。该图像是自动创建的，因此您无需自己创建它。但是，可以使用 setDragImage() 指定自定义拖动反馈图像。

trans-unit.source: When a drag occurs, a translucent image is generated from the drag target (the element the dragstart event is fired at), and follows the mouse pointer during the drag. This image is created automatically, so you do not need to create it yourself. However, if a custom image is desired, the DataTransfer.setDragImage() method can be used to set the custom image to be used.
trans-unit.target: 当发生拖拽时，从所述拖动目标（在该元件产生的半透明图像 dragstart 事件在烧制），并遵循在拖动期间鼠标指针。该图像是自动创建的，因此您无需自己创建它。但是，如果需要自定义图像，则可以使用 DataTransfer.setDragImage() 方法来设置要使用的自定义图像。

trans-unit.source: When a drag occurs, data must be associated with the drag which identifies what is being dragged. For example, when dragging the selected text within a textbox, the data associated with the drag data item is the text itself. Similarly, when dragging a link on a web page, the drag data item is the URL of the link.
trans-unit.target: 当发生拖拽时，数据必须用其识别拖动相关联什么被拖动。例如，当在文本框中拖动选定的文本时，与拖动数据项关联的数据就是文本本身。类似地，在网页上拖动链接时，拖动数据项是链接的URL。

trans-unit.source: When a frame observer is invoked, the observer callback is given one argument that is a PerformanceObserverEntryList object. This object has three methods to retrieve frame data:
trans-unit.target: 调用框架 observer 器时，将为观察器回调提供一个参数，即 PerformanceObserverEntryList 对象。该对象具有三种检索帧数据的方法：

trans-unit.source: When a frame observer is invoked, frame performance entries can be retrieved by calling PerformanceObserverEntryList.getEntriesByType() with an argument of "frame". This method returns a list of "frame" PerformanceEntry objects. Each frame object's duration property returns the timestamp of two consecutive frames. If this value is greater than the time needed to provide a good user experience, further analysis might be warranted.
trans-unit.target: 调用框架 observer 器时，可以通过使用参数“ frame ” 调用 PerformanceObserverEntryList.getEntriesByType() 来检索框架 performance entries 。此方法返回“ frame ” PerformanceEntry 对象的列表。每个帧对象的 duration 属性返回两个连续帧的时间戳。如果此值大于提供良好用户体验所需的时间，则可能需要进一步分析。

trans-unit.source: When a fullscreen request fails
trans-unit.target: 当全屏请求失败时

trans-unit.source: When a key is pressed and held down, it begins to auto-repeat. This results in a sequence of events similar to the following being dispatched:
trans-unit.target: 当一个键被按下后,它开始自动重复。这将导致一系列类似于以下的事件被发出。

trans-unit.source: When a matching performance entry is recorded, the performance observer's callback function—set when creating the PerformanceObserver—is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 记录匹配的性能条目后，将调用性能观察者的回调函数（在创建 PerformanceObserver 时设置）。

trans-unit.source: When a member returns an object of type document (e.g., the ownerDocument property of an element returns the document to which it belongs), this object is the root document object itself. The DOM document Reference chapter describes the document object.
trans-unit.target: 当成员返回 document 类型的对象（例如，元素的 ownerDocument 属性返回其所属的 document ）时，该对象就是根 document 对象本身。该DOM document 参考章节描述了 document 对象。

trans-unit.source: When a message comes back through the port from the worker, we check what result type it is, then insert the calculation result inside the appropriate result paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 当消息从 Worker 的端口返回时,我们会检查它是什么结果类型,然后将计算结果插入到相应的结果段中。

trans-unit.source: When a message is posted, a message event will be dispatched to each BroadcastChannel object connected to this channel. There is no action by default, but a new function can be implemented using the onmessage event handler.
trans-unit.target: 发布消息后， message 事件将分派给连接到此频道的每个 BroadcastChannel 对象。默认情况下不执行任何操作，但是可以使用 onmessage 事件处理程序实现新功能。

trans-unit.source: When a message is received back from the IFrame confirming that the original message was received successfully, this simply outputs the confirmation to a paragraph and empties the text input ready for the next message to be sent.
trans-unit.target: 当收到从IFrame返回的消息,确认原始消息已成功接收时,这只是将确认输出到一个段落,并清空文本输入,为下一条消息的发送做好准备。

trans-unit.source: When a message is received back from the IFrame, the onMessage function simply outputs the message to a paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 从IFrame收到消息后， onMessage 函数仅将消息输出到段落。

trans-unit.source: When a message is received from the main page we create a list item and insert it in the unordered list, setting the Node.textContent of the list item equal to the event's data attribute (this contains the actual message).
trans-unit.target: 当从主页接收到一条消息时，我们创建一个列表项并将其插入到无序列表中，将列表项的 Node.textContent 设置为等于事件的 data 属性（其中包含实际消息）。

trans-unit.source: When a native TextEncoder implementation is not available, the most light-weight solution would be to use TextEncoderLite with base64-js. Use the browser implementation when you can.
trans-unit.target: 当本机 TextEncoder 实现不可用时，最轻巧的解决方案是将TextEncoderLite与base64-js一起使用。如果可以，请使用浏览器实现。

trans-unit.source: When a new Headers object is created using the Headers()constructor, its guard is set to none (the default). When a Request or Response object is created, it has an associated Headers object whose guard is set as summarized below:
trans-unit.target: 使用 Headers() 构造函数创建新的 Headers 对象时，其保护设置为 none （默认值）。当一个 Request 或 Response 被创建的对象，它具有一个相关联的 Headers 对象，其防护装置被设置为总结如下：

trans-unit.source: When a new Request object is constructed, you can pass it a ReadableStream in the body property of its RequestInit dictionary. This Request could then be passed to a WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope.fetch() to commence fetching the stream.
trans-unit.target: 构造新的 Request 对象时，可以在其 RequestInit 字典的 body 属性中向其传递 ReadableStream 。然后可以将此 Request 传递到 WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope.fetch() 以开始获取流。

trans-unit.source: When a new ICE candidate is received by your signaling code from the remote peer, you need to construct the RTCIceCandidate object that encapsulates it. This is done in the event handler for the icecandidate event. If your client-side signaling layer builds and transmits a JSON string including the candidate to the remote peer, the remote peer might handle receiving that JSON message like this:
trans-unit.target: 当您的信令代码从远程对等方接收到新的ICE候选者时，您需要构造封装它的 RTCIceCandidate 对象。这是在 icecandidate 事件的事件处理程序中完成的。如果您的客户端信令层构建并将包括候选者的JSON字符串传输到远程对等方，则远程对等方可能会像下面这样处理接收该JSON消息：

trans-unit.source: When a non-empty string is assigned to the returnValue Event property, a dialog box appears, asking the users for confirmation to leave the page (see example below). When no value is provided, the event is processed silently. Some implementations only show the dialog box if the frame or any embedded frame receives a user gesture or user interaction. See Browser compatibility for more information.
trans-unit.target: 当将非空字符串分配给 returnValue Event属性时，将出现一个对话框，要求用户确认离开页面（请参见下面的示例）。如果未提供任何值，则事件将以静默方式处理。如果框架或任何嵌入式框架接收到用户手势或用户交互，则某些实现仅显示对话框。有关更多信息，请参见浏览器兼容性。

trans-unit.source: When a proxy is used, if a tunnel connection is established, this property returns the ALPN Protocol ID of the tunneled protocol. Otherwise, this property returns the ALPN Protocol ID of the first hop to the proxy.
trans-unit.target: 当使用代理时,如果建立了隧道连接,此属性返回隧道协议的ALPN协议ID。否则,此属性返回到代理的第一跳的ALPN协议ID。

trans-unit.source: When a resource (such as an <img> or <script>) fails to load, an error event using interface Event is fired at the element that initiated the load, and the onerror() handler on the element is invoked. These error events do not bubble up to window, but (at least in Firefox) can be handled with a single capturing window.addEventListener.
trans-unit.target: 当资源（例如 <img> 或 <script> ）无法加载时，会在发起加载的元素上触发使用接口 Event 的 error 事件，并调用该元素上的 onerror() 处理函数。这些错误事件不会冒出窗口，但是（至少在Firefox中）可以使用单个捕获 window.addEventListener 进行处理。

trans-unit.source: When a runtime error occurs in the worker, its onerror event handler is called. It receives an event named error which implements the ErrorEvent interface.
trans-unit.target: 当工作 onerror 发生运行时错误时，将调用其onerror事件处理程序。它收到一个名为 error 的事件，该事件实现了 ErrorEvent 接口。

trans-unit.source: When a second argument is present: If the second argument evaluates to true, add the specified class value, and if it evaluates to false, remove it.
trans-unit.target: 当存在第二个参数时：如果第二个参数的值为 true ，则添加指定的类值；如果第二个参数的值为 false ，则将其删除。

trans-unit.source: When a service worker is initially registered, pages won't use it until they next load. The claim() method causes those pages to be controlled immediately. Be aware that this results in your service worker controlling pages that loaded regularly over the network, or possibly via a different service worker.
trans-unit.target: 最初注册服务工作者时，页面将在下一次加载之前才使用它。在 claim() 方法使这些页面将被立即控制。请注意，这会导致您的服务人员控制通过网络或可能通过其他服务人员定期加载的页面。

trans-unit.source: When a single user interaction with an input device generates a series of different input events, the sourceCapabilities property for all of them will point to the same instance of InputDeviceCapabilities. For example, when a user lifts their finger off of a touchscreen, several UIEvents may be generated including touchend, mousedown, click, and focus. All of these events must have the same sourceCapabilities representing the touchscreen.
trans-unit.target: 当与输入设备的单个用户交互生成一系列不同的输入事件时，所有输入事件的 sourceCapabilities 属性将指向 InputDeviceCapabilities 的相同实例。例如，当用户将手指从触摸屏上移开时，可能会生成多个UIEvent，包括 touchend ， mousedown ， click 和 focus 。所有这些事件必须具有相同的表示触摸屏的 sourceCapabilities 。

trans-unit.source: When a syntax(?) error occurs in a script, loaded from a different origin, the details of the syntax error are not reported to prevent leaking information (see bug 363897). Instead the error reported is simply "Script error." This behavior can be overriden in some browsers using the crossorigin attribute on <script> and having the server send the appropriate CORS HTTP response headers. A workaround is to isolate "Script error." and handle it knowing that the error detail is only viewable in the browser console and not accessible via JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 当脚本（从另一个来源加载）中发生语法（？）错误时，不会报告语法错误的详细信息以防止信息泄漏（请参见bug 363897）。相反，报告的错误仅是 "Script error." 在某些浏览器中，可以使用 <script> 上的 crossorigin 属性覆盖此行为，并让服务器发送适当的CORS HTTP响应标头。一种解决方法是隔离“脚本错误”。并知道该错误详细信息只能在浏览器控制台中查看，而无法通过JavaScript进行访问，从而进行处理。

trans-unit.source: When a table has its dir set to "rtl", the column order is arranged from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 当表的 dir 设置为 "rtl" ，列的顺序从右到左排列。

trans-unit.source: When a tone finishes playing
trans-unit.target: 当一个音弹完后

trans-unit.source: When a user begins to drag, the dragstart event is fired. In this example the dragstart listener is added to the draggable element itself; however, you could listen to a higher ancestor as drag events bubble up as most other events do. Within the dragstart event, you can specify the drag data, the feedback image, and the drag effects, all of which are described below. However, only the drag data is required; the default image and drag effects are suitable in many situations.
trans-unit.target: 当用户开始拖动时，将触发 dragstart 事件。在这个例子中， dragstart 侦听器被添加到了可拖动元素本身。但是，随着拖动事件像大多数其他事件一样冒泡，您可以聆听更高祖先的声音。在 dragstart 事件中，您可以指定拖动数据，反馈图像和拖动效果，所有这些都在下面描述。但是，仅需要拖动数据。默认的图像和拖动效果适用于许多情况。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks on a notification generated by an app, you will be notified of this event in two different ways, depending on the circumstance:
trans-unit.target: 当用户点击应用产生的通知时,你会根据不同的情况,以两种不同的方式通知这个事件。

trans-unit.source: When a user holds their mouse down or presses their finger on the cake on a touch screen, we can now call growAlice to make all the animations play:
trans-unit.target: 现在，当用户按住鼠标或将手指按在触摸屏上的蛋糕上时，我们现在可以调用 growAlice 来播放所有动画：

trans-unit.source: When a user starts a WebRTC call to another user, a special description is created called an offer. This description includes all the information about the caller's proposed configuration for the call. The recipient then responds with an answer, which is a description of their end of the call. In this way, both devices share with one another the information needed in order to exchange media data. This exchange is handled using Interactive Connectivity Establishment (ICE, a protocol which lets two devices use an intermediary to exchange offers and answers even if the two devices are separated by Network Address Translation (NAT).
trans-unit.target: 当用户向另一个用户发起WebRTC呼叫时，会创建一个特殊的描述，称为offer。此描述包括有关呼叫者为呼叫建议的配置的所有信息。然后，接收者用一个答案来回应，这是他们通话结束的描述。以此方式，两个设备彼此共享为了交换媒体数据所需的信息。这种交换是使用交互式连接建立（ICE）处理的，该协议允许两个设备使用中介程序交换要约和答复，即使两个设备之间都被网络地址转换（NAT）隔开。

trans-unit.source: When a web site or app using RTCPeerConnection receives a new ICE candidate from the remote peer over its signaling channel, it delivers the newly-received candidate to the browser's ICE agent by calling RTCPeerConnection.addIceCandidate(). This adds this new remote candidate to the RTCPeerConnection's remote description, which describes the state of the remote end of the connection.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 RTCPeerConnection 的网站或应用通过其信令通道从远程对等方接收到新的ICE候选者时，它将通过调用 RTCPeerConnection.addIceCandidate() 将新接收到的候选者传递给浏览器的ICE代理。这会将这个新的远程候选者添加到 RTCPeerConnection 的远程描述中，该描述描述了连接的远程端的状态。

trans-unit.source: When a web site or app using RTCPeerConnection receives a new ICE candidate from the remote peer over its signaling channel, it delivers the newly-received candidate to the browser's ICE agent by calling RTCPeerConnection.addIceCandidate().
trans-unit.target: 当使用 RTCPeerConnection 的网站或应用通过其信令通道从远程对等方接收到新的ICE候选者时，它将通过调用 RTCPeerConnection.addIceCandidate() 将新接收到的候选者传递给浏览器的ICE代理。

trans-unit.source: When a window is loaded in an <iframe>, <object>, or <frame>, its parent is the window with the element embedding the window.
trans-unit.target: 当将窗口加载到 <iframe> ， <object> 或 <frame> 时，其父窗口是带有嵌入该窗口的元素的窗口。

trans-unit.source: When a window is opened from another window (using Window.open or a link with its target attribute set), it maintains a reference to that first window as window.opener. If the current window has no opener, this method returns null.
trans-unit.target: 当从另一个窗口（使用 Window.open 或设置了其 target 属性的链接）打开一个窗口时，它会将对第一个窗口的引用保持为 window.opener 。如果当前窗口没有打开器，则此方法返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: When a writer is created and starts writing to a stream (an active writer), it is said to be locked to it. Only one writer can write to a writable stream at one time. If you want another writer to start writing to your stream, you typically need to abort it before you then attach another writer to it.
trans-unit.target: 创建写程序并开始写到流（活动写程序）时，据说它已锁定到该流。一次只能有一位作家可以写入可写流。如果要其他作者开始向流中写入，通常需要先中止它，然后再将其他作者附加到该流上。

trans-unit.source: When abort is closed, any previously enqueued chunks are just thrown away immediately and then the stream is moved to an errored state. This also triggers any abort() method specified in the WritableStream() constructor to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 当中止关闭时，所有先前排队的块会立即被丢弃，然后将流移到错误状态。这还会触发 WritableStream() 构造函数中指定的所有 abort() 方法被调用。

trans-unit.source: When an IntersectionObserver is created, it's configured to watch for given ratios of visibility within the root. The configuration cannot be changed once the IntersectionObserver is created, so a given observer object is only useful for watching for specific changes in degree of visibility; however, you can watch multiple target elements with the same observer.
trans-unit.target: 当 IntersectionObserver 被创建，它被配置成监视根内的可见性给定的比率。一旦创建了 IntersectionObserver ，便无法更改该配置，因此给定的观察者对象仅可用于观察可见度的特定变化。但是，您可以使用同一观察者观察多个目标元素。

trans-unit.source: When an attribute is returned by a member (e.g., by the createAttribute() method), it is an object reference that exposes a special (albeit small) interface for attributes. Attributes are nodes in the DOM just like elements are, though you may rarely use them as such.
trans-unit.target: 当成员返回一个 attribute （例如，通过 createAttribute() 方法）时，它是一个对象引用，它为属性提供了一个特殊的（尽管很小）接口。属性是DOM中的节点，就像元素一样，尽管您很少会像这样使用它们。

trans-unit.source: When an HTML <base> tag is found in the document;
trans-unit.target: 在文档中找到HTML <base> 标记时；

trans-unit.source: When an HTML document has been switched to designMode, its document object exposes an execCommand method to run commands that manipulate the current editable region, such as form inputs or contentEditable elements.
trans-unit.target: 当HTML文档已切换到 designMode 时，其 document 对象将公开 execCommand 方法来运行用于操作当前可编辑区域的命令，例如表单输入或 contentEditable 元素。

trans-unit.source: When an animation is cancelled, its startTime and currentTime are set to null.
trans-unit.target: 取消动画时，其 startTime 和 currentTime 设置为 null 。

trans-unit.source: When an attribute is set, it's value is always converted into a string. For example null is converted into the string "null".
trans-unit.target: 设置属性后，其值始终会转换为字符串。例如，将 null 转换为字符串“ null”。

trans-unit.source: When an audio signal is processed, sampling means the conversion of a continuous signal to a discrete signal; or put another way, a continuous sound wave, such as a band playing live, is converted to a sequence of samples (a discrete-time signal) that allow a computer to handle the audio in distinct blocks.
trans-unit.target: 当处理音频信号，采样手段的转化连续信号为离散的信号 ; 换句话讲，连续的声波（例如正在现场演奏的乐队）将转换为一系列采样（离散时间信号），从而使计算机可以处理不同块中的音频。

trans-unit.source: When an authenticator registers a new key pair with a service, the authenticator signs the public key with an attestation certificate. The attestation certificate is built in to the authenticator during manufacturing time and is specific to a device model. That is, all "Samsung Galaxy S8" phones, manufactured at a specific time or particular manufacturing run, have the same attestation certificate.
trans-unit.target: 当认证器向服务注册新的密钥对时,认证器会用认证证书签署公钥。认证证书是在制造时内置在认证器中的,并且是针对某个设备型号的。也就是说,所有 "三星Galaxy S8 "手机,在特定的时间或特定的制造运行中,都有相同的认证证书。

trans-unit.source: When an element has its dir set to "auto", the direction of the element is determined based on its first strong directionality character, or default to the directionality of its parent element.
trans-unit.target: 当元素的dir设置为 "auto" ，将根据元素的第一个强方向性字符确定元素的方向，或者默认为其父元素的方向性。

trans-unit.source: When an error occurs while attempting to add the ICE candidate, the Promise returned by this method is rejected, returning one of the errors below as the name attribute in the specified DOMException object passed to the rejection handler.
trans-unit.target: 当尝试添加ICE候选者时发生错误时，此方法返回的 Promise 被拒绝，将以下错误之一作为传递给拒绝处理程序的指定 DOMException 对象中的 name 属性返回。

trans-unit.source: When an incoming connection is created, a receiving user agentfires a trusted event, named connectionavailable, on a PresentationReceiver. The trusted event is fired at the presentation controller's monitor, using the PresentationConnectionAvailableEvent interface, with the connection attribute set to the PresentationConnection object that was created.
trans-unit.target: 创建传入连接后，接收用户代理会在 PresentationReceiver 上触发一个可信事件，名为 connectionavailable 。该信任的事件是在发射演示控制器的显示器，使用 PresentationConnectionAvailableEvent 接口，与 connection 属性设置到 PresentationConnection 所创建的对象。

trans-unit.source: When an object or array is stored, the properties and values in that object or array can also be anything that is a valid value.
trans-unit.target: 当一个对象或数组被存储时,该对象或数组中的属性和值也可以是任何有效值。

trans-unit.source: When an user chooses to log in to a service, the server sends a challenge and the authenticator signs over it with a key pair previously registered to that service. This creates an assertion. Unlike the attestation, the format of the assertion is always the same regardless of the device being used.
trans-unit.target: 当用户选择登录一个服务时,服务器会发送一个挑战,验证者会用之前注册到该服务的密钥对进行签名。这就创建了一个断言。与证明不同的是,无论使用何种设备,断言的格式总是相同的。

trans-unit.source: When called on an HTML document, getElementsByTagName() lower-cases its argument before proceeding. This is undesirable when trying to match camelCase SVG elements in a subtree in an HTML document. document.getElementsByTagNameNS() is useful in that case. See also bug 499656.
trans-unit.target: 在HTML文档上调用时， getElementsByTagName() 在继续操作之前将其参数小写。当尝试匹配HTML文档的子树中的camelCase SVG元素时，这是不希望的。在这种情况下， document.getElementsByTagNameNS() 很有用。另请参阅错误499656。

trans-unit.source: When called on an HTML element in a DOM flagged as an HTML document, getAttribute() lower-cases its argument before proceeding.
trans-unit.target: 在标记为HTML文档的DOM中的HTML元素上调用 getAttribute() 时,将其参数小写，然后继续。

trans-unit.source: When called on an HTML element in a DOM flagged as an HTML document, getAttributeNode lower-cases its argument before proceeding.
trans-unit.target: 在标记为HTML文档的DOM中的HTML元素上调用 getAttributeNode 时,将其参数小写，然后再继续。

trans-unit.source: When called on an HTML element in an HTML document, getElementsByTagName lower-cases the argument before searching for it. This is undesirable when trying to match camel-cased SVG elements (such as <linearGradient>) in an HTML document. Instead, use Element.getElementsByTagNameNS(), which preserves the capitalization of the tag name.
trans-unit.target: 在HTML文档中的HTML元素上调用 getElementsByTagName 时，在搜索参数之前将其小写。在尝试匹配HTML文档中的驼峰式SVG元素（例如 <linearGradient> ）时，这是不希望的。而是使用 Element.getElementsByTagNameNS() ，以保留标签名称的大写形式。

trans-unit.source: When cast to string, either by appending an empty string ("") or using Selection.toString(), this object returns the text selected.
trans-unit.target: 当转换为字符串时，通过添加空字符串（ "" ）或使用 Selection.toString() ，此对象将返回选定的文本。

trans-unit.source: When changing the description by calling setLocalDescription() or setRemoteDescription(), the specified description is set as the pending description, and the WebRTC layer begins to evaluate whether or not it's acceptable. Once the proposed description has been agreed upon, the value of currentLocalDescription or currentRemoteDescription is changed to the pending description, and the pending description is set to null again, indicating that there isn't a pending description.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用 setLocalDescription() 或 setRemoteDescription() 更改描述时，将指定的描述设置为暂挂描述，然后WebRTC层开始评估它是否可接受。一旦提议的描述已达成共识， currentLocalDescription 或 currentRemoteDescription 的值将更改为未决描述，并且未决描述将再次设置为null，表示没有待决描述。

trans-unit.source: When changing the gain value of a GainNode, Google Chrome prior to version 64 (January 2018) would perform a smooth interpolation to prevent dezippering. Starting with version 64, the value is changed instantly to bring it in line with the Web Audio spec. See Chrome Platform Status for details.
trans-unit.target: 更改 GainNode 的增益值时，版本64（2018年1月）之前的Google Chrome浏览器将执行平滑插值以防止解压缩。从版本64开始，该值会立即更改以使其符合Web Audio规范。有关详情，请参见Chrome平台状态。

trans-unit.source: When clearing site storage units, an origin's box is treated as a single entity; if the user agent needs to clear it and the user approves, the entire data store is cleared rather than providing some means of clearing only data from individual APIs.
trans-unit.target: 在清除站点存储单元时,原点的盒子被视为一个单一的实体;如果用户代理需要清除它,并且用户批准,整个数据存储就会被清除,而不是提供一些只清除单个API的数据的手段。

trans-unit.source: When constructing an instance of the PaymentRequest, you are able to supply an custom id via PaymentDetailsInit dictionary's id member. If none is provided, the browser automatically sets the id value to a UUID.
trans-unit.target: 在构造 PaymentRequest 实例时，您可以通过 PaymentDetailsInit 词典的 id 成员提供自定义ID 。如果未提供，浏览器将自动将id值设置为UUID。

trans-unit.source: When content overflows window viewport dimensions, then scrollbar(s) (or some scrolling mechanism) are necessary to ensure that content can be accessed by users. Content can overflow window dimensions for several reasons which are outside the control of web authors:
trans-unit.target: 当内容溢出窗口视口尺寸时,那么滚动条(或一些滚动机制)是必要的,以确保内容可以被用户访问。内容会溢出窗口尺寸的原因有好几个,这些原因都不在网页作者的控制范围内。

trans-unit.source: When copying a directory, the copy is always recursive; you can't leave out subfolders.
trans-unit.target: 复制目录时,总是递归复制,不能漏掉子文件夹。

trans-unit.source: When creating a graph that has a cycle, it is mandatory to have at least one DelayNode in the cycle, or the nodes taking part in the cycle will be muted.
trans-unit.target: 创建具有周期的图时，必须在周期中至少有一个 DelayNode ，否则将使参与该周期的节点静音。

trans-unit.source: When creating an IIR filter, we pass in the feedforward and feedback coefficients as options (coefficients is how we describe the values). Both of these parameters are arrays, neither of which can be larger than 20 items.
trans-unit.target: 创建IIR滤波器时，我们将 feedforward 和 feedback 系数作为选项传递（系数是我们描述值的方式）。这两个参数都是数组，两个参数均不能大于20。

trans-unit.source: When creating the NodeIterator, the filter object is passed in as the third parameter, and the object method acceptNode(node) is called on every single node to determine whether or not to accept it. This function should return the constant NodeFilter.FILTER_ACCEPT for cases when the node should be accepted and NodeFilter.FILTER_REJECT for cases when the node should be rejected.
trans-unit.target: 创建 NodeIterator 时，将过滤器对象作为第三个参数传入，并在每个节点上调用对象方法 acceptNode(node) 以确定是否接受它。这个函数应该返回常量 NodeFilter.FILTER_ACCEPT 的情况下，当节点应该接受并 NodeFilter.FILTER_REJECT 的情况下，当节点应该被拒绝。

trans-unit.source: When creating the TreeWalker, the filter object is passed in as the third parameter, and its method NodeFilter.acceptNode() is called on every single node to determine whether or not to accept it.
trans-unit.target: 创建 TreeWalker 时，将过滤器对象作为第三个参数传入，并在每个节点上调用其方法 NodeFilter.acceptNode() 以确定是否接受它。

trans-unit.source: When dealing with security, the whole system must be considered. In the case of the Web Crypto API, Web developers shouldn't consider only the security of the script, but the security of the connection to the server, because using Web Crypto over HTTP is not secure. The overall security can't be stronger than the security of the weakest part of the overall system.
trans-unit.target: 在处理安全性时，必须考虑整个系统。对于Web Crypto API，Web开发人员不应仅考虑脚本的安全性，而应考虑与服务器连接的安全性，因为通过HTTP使用Web Crypto是不安全的。总体安全性不能强于整个系统最弱部分的安全性。

trans-unit.source: When defining the scope, specify only the object stores you need. This way, you can run multiple transactions with non-overlapping scopes concurrently.
trans-unit.target: 定义范围时，仅指定所需的对象存储。这样，您可以同时运行具有非重叠范围的多个事务。

trans-unit.source: When defining the scope, specify only the object stores you need. This way, you can run multiple transactions with non-overlapping scopes concurrently.
trans-unit.target: 在定义作用域时,只指定你需要的对象存储。这样,你就可以同时运行多个具有非重叠作用域的事务。

trans-unit.source: When describing a codec for an RTCRtpSender, codecPayloadType is a single 8-bit byte (or octet) specifying the codec to use for sending the stream.
trans-unit.target: 当描述 RTCRtpSender 的编解码器时， codecPayloadType 是一个8位字节（或八位字节），指定用于发送流的编解码器。

trans-unit.source: When dragging text, use the text/plain type. The data should be the string to drag. For example:
trans-unit.target: 拖动文本时，请使用 text/plain 类型。数据应为要拖动的字符串。例如：

trans-unit.source: When dragging, there are several operations that may be performed. The copy operation is used to indicate that the data being dragged will be copied from its present location to the drop location. The move operation is used to indicate that the data being dragged will be moved, and the link operation is used to indicate that some form of relationship or connection will be created between the source and drop locations.
trans-unit.target: 拖动时，可以执行几项操作。该 copy 操作被用来指示正在被拖动数据将从其当前位置到液滴的位置被复制。的 move 操作被用于指示正被拖动的数据将被移动，并且所述 link 被用来操作以表明一些形式的关系或连接的将源极和下降位置之间被创建。

trans-unit.source: When each octave element has been built, it's appended to the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 当每个八度元素建立后,就会附加到键盘上。

trans-unit.source: When each peer's ICE layer begins to send candidates, it enters into an exchange among the various points in the chain that looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 当每个对等体的ICE层开始发送候选者时,就会在链上的各个点之间进入一个类似于这样的交换。

trans-unit.source: When element has display: inline, then clientLeft returns 0 regardless of the element's border.
trans-unit.target: 当元素具有 display: inline ，则 clientLeft 返回 0 而不管元素的边框如何。

trans-unit.source: When extreme changes in context are explicitly identified before they occur, then the users can determine if they wish to proceed or so they can be prepared for the change: not only they will not be confused or feel disoriented, but more experienced users can better decide how to open such links (in a new window or not, in the same window, in a new tab or not, in "background" or not).
trans-unit.target: 当上下文的极端变化在发生之前就被明确地识别出来,那么用户就可以决定是否要继续下去,或者说他们可以为这种变化做好准备:不仅他们不会感到困惑或迷茫,而且更有经验的用户可以更好地决定如何打开这种链接(在新窗口或不在新窗口,在同一窗口,在新标签页或不在新标签页,在 "后台 "或不在后台)。

trans-unit.source: When fetching a resource, if there are multiple HTTP redirects, and any of the redirects have an origin that is different from the current document, and the timing allow check algorithm passes for each redirected resource, this property returns the time immediately after receiving the last byte of the response of the last redirect; otherwise, zero is returned.
trans-unit.target: 在获取资源时,如果有多个HTTP重定向,且任何一个重定向的源头都与当前文档不同,且每个重定向资源的定时允许检查算法都通过了,那么这个属性就会返回接收到最后一个重定向的响应的最后一个字节后的时间;否则,返回0。

trans-unit.source: When firing a CustomEvent from privileged code (i.e. an extension) to non-privileged code (i.e. a webpage), security issues should be considered. Firefox and other Gecko applications restrict an object created in one context from being directly used for another, which will automatically prevent security holes, but these restrictions may also prevent your code from running as expected.
trans-unit.target: 当从特权代码(即扩展)向非特权代码(即网页)发射CustomEvent时,应考虑安全问题。Firefox和其他Gecko应用程序限制在一个上下文中创建的对象直接用于另一个上下文,这将自动防止安全漏洞,但这些限制也可能阻止您的代码按预期运行。

trans-unit.source: When fullscreen mode is successfully engaged, the document which contains the element receives a fullscreenchange event. When fullscreen mode is exited, the document again receives a fullscreenchange event. Note that the fullscreenchange event doesn't provide any information itself as to whether the document is entering or exiting fullscreen mode, but if the document has a non null fullscreenElement, you know you're in fullscreen mode.
trans-unit.target: 成功启用全屏模式后，包含该元素的文档将收到 fullscreenchange 事件。退出全屏模式后，文档再次收到 fullscreenchange 事件。请注意， fullscreenchange 事件本身并不提供有关文档是否进入全屏模式或退出全屏模式的任何信息，但是如果文档具有非null的 fullscreenElement ，您就知道您处于全屏模式。

trans-unit.source: When getModifierState() returns true on Gecko?
trans-unit.target: 当getModifierState()在Gecko上返回true?

trans-unit.source: When getting data from getFloatFrequencyData() or getByteFrequencyData(), any frequencies with an amplitude of maxDecibels or higher will be returned as +1.0 or 255, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 从 getFloatFrequencyData() 或 getByteFrequencyData() 获取数据时，任何振幅为 maxDecibels 或更高的频率将分别返回 +1.0 或 255 。

trans-unit.source: When getting data from getFloatFrequencyData() or getByteFrequencyData(), any frequencies with an amplitude of minDecibels or lower will be returned as 0.0 or 0, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 从 getFloatFrequencyData() 或 getByteFrequencyData() 获取数据时，任何振幅为 minDecibels 或更低的频率都将分别返回 0.0 或0。

trans-unit.source: When implementing PushManager subscriptions, it is vitally important that you protect against CSRF/XSRF issues in your app. See the following articles for more information:
trans-unit.target: 在实现PushManager订阅时,保护您的应用程序免受CSRF/XSRF问题的影响是非常重要的。请参阅以下文章了解更多信息。

trans-unit.source: When in quirks mode, the scrollingElement attribute returns the HTML body element if it exists and is not potentially scrollable, otherwise it returns null.
trans-unit.target: 在怪癖模式下， scrollingElement 属性返回HTML body 元素（如果存在）并且不可滚动，否则返回null。

trans-unit.source: When inserting HTML into a page by using insertAdjacentHTML be careful not to use user input that hasn't been escaped.
trans-unit.target: 使用 insertAdjacentHTML 将HTML插入页面时，请注意不要使用尚未转义的用户输入。

trans-unit.source: When invoked with a string consisting of SVG path data, a new path is created from that description.
trans-unit.target: 用包含SVG路径数据的字符串调用时，将从该描述中创建一个新路径。

trans-unit.source: When invoked with another Path2D object, a copy of the path argument is created.
trans-unit.target: 与另一个 Path2D 对象一起调用时，将创建 path 参数的副本。

trans-unit.source: When invoked, will empty all keys out of the storage.
trans-unit.target: 当调用时,将清空所有钥匙的存储。

trans-unit.source: When invoking this method directly, no submit event is raised (in particular, the form's onsubmit event handler is not run), and constraint validation is not triggered either.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用此方法时，不会引发 onsubmit 事件（特别是不会运行表单的onsubmit事件处理程序），并且也不会触发约束验证。

trans-unit.source: When it takes a positive value it is a real gain, when negative it is an attenuation.
trans-unit.target: 当它取正值时是实际增益,负值时是衰减。

trans-unit.source: When its value changes, as the user's preferred languages are changed a languagechange event is fired on the Window object.
trans-unit.target: 当其值更改时，随着用户首选语言的更改，将在 Window 对象上触发 languagechange 事件。

trans-unit.source: When looping is enabled, the sound begins playing at the time specified as the start point when start() is called. When the time specified by the loopEnd property is reached, playback continues at the time specified by loopStart
trans-unit.target: 启用循环后，声音将在调用 start() 时指定为起点的时间开始播放。达到 loopEnd 属性指定的时间后，播放将在 loopStart 指定的时间继续

trans-unit.source: When moving a directory, the move is always recursive; you can't leave out subfolders.
trans-unit.target: 在移动目录时,总是递归移动,不能漏掉子文件夹。

trans-unit.source: When new tracks are added to the RTCPeerConnection— either by calling its addTrack() method or because of renegotiation of the stream's format—a track event is set to the RTCPeerConnection for each track added to the connection. Making use of newly added media requires implementing a handler for the track event. A common need is to attach the incoming media to an appropriate HTML element. In our example, we add the track's stream to the <video> element that displays the incoming video:
trans-unit.target: 将新的轨道添加到 RTCPeerConnection 时（通过调用其 addTrack() 方法或由于重新协商流的格式）， RTCPeerConnection 添加到该连接的每个轨道的RTCPeerConnection设置一个 track 事件。利用新添加的媒体需要实现 track 事件的处理程序。通常需要将传入媒体附加到适当的HTML元素。在我们的示例中，我们将曲目的流添加到显示输入视频的 <video> 元素中：

trans-unit.source: When no pages are using the current version, the new worker activates and becomes responsible for fetches.
trans-unit.target: 当没有页面使用当前版本时,新的 Worker 会激活并负责获取。

trans-unit.source: When numbers are extremely large (or extremely small) on computers they begin to become less and less precise because there are only so many ones and zeros that are used to represent them. The more operations that are done on larger numbers, the more and more errors accumulate into the result. When dividing by w, this can effectively increase the precision of very large numbers by operating on two potentially smaller, less error-prone numbers.
trans-unit.target: 当计算机上的数字非常大(或非常小)时,它们开始变得越来越不精确,因为只有这么多的1和0用来表示它们。对较大的数字进行的运算越多,积累到结果中的误差就越多。在除以w时,通过对两个可能较小、不易出错的数进行操作,可以有效地提高非常大数的精度。

trans-unit.source: When only one argument is present: Toggle the class value; i.e., if the class exists then remove it and return false, if not, then add it and return true.
trans-unit.target: 当仅存在一个参数时：切换类的值；否则，返回0。即，如果该类存在，则将其删除并返回 false ；如果不存在，则将其添加并返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: When our button is clicked, we prevent the form from submitting as normal and then send the value entered in our text input to the IFrame via the MessageChannel.
trans-unit.target: 当单击按钮时，我们阻止表单正常提交，然后通过 MessageChannel 将在文本输入中输入的值发送到IFrame 。

trans-unit.source: When passed a key name and value, will add that key to the storage, or update that key's value if it already exists.
trans-unit.target: 当传递一个键名和值时,将把该键添加到存储中,或者更新该键的值,如果它已经存在。

trans-unit.source: When passed a key name, will remove that key from the storage.
trans-unit.target: 当传递一个密钥名称时,将从存储中删除该密钥。

trans-unit.source: When passed a key name, will return that key's value.
trans-unit.target: 当传递一个键名时,将返回该键的值。

trans-unit.source: When passed a number n, this method will return the name of the nth key in the storage.
trans-unit.target: 当传递一个数字n时,本方法将返回存储中第n个键的名称。

trans-unit.source: When passed a valid media configuration, it returns a promise with information as to whether the media type is supported, and whether decoding such media would be smooth and power efficient.
trans-unit.target: 当传递一个有效的媒体配置时,它返回一个承诺,其中包含媒体类型是否被支持,以及解码这种媒体是否会流畅和省电的信息。

trans-unit.source: When passed a valid media configuration, it returns a promise with information as to whether the media type is supported, and whether encoding such media would be smooth and power efficient.
trans-unit.target: 当传递一个有效的媒体配置时,它返回一个承诺,其中包含媒体类型是否被支持的信息,以及对这种媒体进行编码是否会流畅和省电。

trans-unit.source: When playing sound on the web, it's important to allow the user to control it. Depending on the use case, there's a myriad of options, but we'll provide functionality to play/pause the sound, alter the track's volume, and pan it from left to right.
trans-unit.target: 当在网络上播放声音时,让用户控制它是很重要的。根据不同的使用情况,有无数的选项,但我们将提供播放/暂停声音、改变轨道的音量以及从左到右平移的功能。

trans-unit.source: When pointer capture is set, pointerover, pointeroutpointerenter and pointerleave events are only generated when crossing the boundary of the element that has capture set since other elements can no longer be targeted by the pointer. This has the effect of suppressing these events on all other elements.
trans-unit.target: 当指针捕获被设置， pointerover ， pointerout pointerenter 和 pointerleave 仅跨越具有捕获集，因为其他元件可以不再由指针待靶向的元件的边界时生成的事件。这具有抑制所有其他元素上的这些事件的效果。

trans-unit.source: When possible, avoid polling muted to monitor the track's muting status. Instead, add event listeners for the mute and unmute events.
trans-unit.target: 尽可能避免将轮询 muted 以监视轨道的静音状态。而是为 mute 和 unmute 事件添加事件侦听器。

trans-unit.source: When retrieving a dropped link, you should ensure you handle the case where multiple links may have been dragged, including any comments that appear in the data. You should not add data using the URL type; attempting to do so will just set the value of the text/uri-list type instead.

trans-unit.source: When the Promise returned by getUserMedia() is resolved, the preview <video> element's srcobject attribute is set to be the input stream, which causes the video being captured by the user's camera to be displayed in the preview box. Since the <video> element is muted, the audio won't play. The "Download" button's link is then set to refer to the stream as well. Then, in line 8, we arrange for preview.captureStream() to call preview.mozCaptureStream() so that our code will work on Firefox, on which the MediaRecorder.captureStream() method is prefixed. Then a new Promise which resolves when the preview video starts to play is created and returned.
trans-unit.target: 解析 getUserMedia() 返回的Promise后，将 <video> 预览元素的 srcobject 属性设置为输入流，这将导致用户的摄像头捕获的视频显示在预览框中。由于 <video> 元素被静音，因此音频不会播放。然后，将“下载”按钮的链接设置为也引用该流。然后，在第8行中，我们安排 preview.captureStream() 调用 MediaRecorder.captureStream() preview.mozCaptureStream() 以便我们的代码可在Firefox上运行，并在其上添加MediaRecorder.captureStream（）方法作为前缀。然后是一个新的 Promise 它会解析并创建预览视频何时开始播放并返回。

trans-unit.target: 当根元素中可见的目标元素的数量超过一个可见性阈值时。

trans-unit.source: When the audio is played to the end, it loops, but you can control how long the loops last by altering loopStart and loopEnd. For example, if you set their values to 20 and 25, respectively, the audio will start to loop between 20 and 25 seconds in to the track.
trans-unit.target: 当音频播放到最后时，它会循环播放，但是您可以通过更改 loopStart 和 loopEnd 来控制循环持续多长时间。例如，如果将它们的值分别设置为20和25，则音频将在进入音轨的20到25秒之间开始循环播放。

trans-unit.source: When the audio is played to the end, it loops, but you can control how long the loops last by altering loopStart and loopEnd. For example, if you set their values to 20 and 25, respectively, then begin playback, the sound will play normally until it reaches the 25 second mark. Then the current play position will loop back to the 20 second mark and continue playing until the 25 second mark, ad infinitum (or at least until stop() is called).
trans-unit.target: 当音频播放到最后时，它会循环播放，但是您可以通过更改 loopStart 和 loopEnd 来控制循环持续多长时间。例如，如果将它们的值分别设置为20和25，然后开始播放，声音将正常播放，直到达到25秒标记。然后，当前播放位置将循环回到20秒标记，并继续播放，直到25秒标记无限制（或至少直到调用 stop() 为止）。

trans-unit.source: When the button is clicked, the oscillator starts, and the MediaRecorder is started. When the button is stopped, the oscillator and MediaRecorder both stop. Stopping the MediaRecorder causes the dataavailable event to fire, and the event data is pushed into the chunks array. After that, the stop event fires, a new blob is made of type opus — which contains the data in the chunks array, and a new window (tab) is then opened that points to a URL created from the blob.
trans-unit.target: 单击该按钮时，振荡器启动，并且 MediaRecorder 启动。当按钮停止时，振荡器和 MediaRecorder 均停止。停止 MediaRecorder 会 dataavailable 事件，并将事件数据推送到 chunks 数组中。此后，将触发 stop 事件，由opus类型的新 blob 组成-它包含 chunks 数组中的数据，然后打开一个新窗口（选项卡），该窗口指向从blob创建的URL。

trans-unit.source: When the button is pressed, the current position, orientation, etc. of the sensor/head mounted display is set to be 0 — this makes the method useful for calibration when an app is first loaded.
trans-unit.target: 按下按钮后，传感器/头戴式显示器的当前位置，方向等将设置为0-这使该方法可在首次加载应用程序时用于校准。

trans-unit.source: When the caller's RTCPeerConnection ICE layer comes up with a new candidate to propose, it issues an icecandidate event to callerPC. The icecandidate event handler's job is to transmit the candidate to the receiver. In our example, we are directly controlling both the caller and the receiver, so we can just directly add the candidate to the receiver by calling its addIceCandidate() method. That's handled by handleCallerIceEvent():
trans-unit.target: 当呼叫者的 RTCPeerConnection ICE层提出一个新的候选者提议时，它会向 callerPC 发出 icecandidate 事件。该 icecandidate 事件处理程序的工作就是发送考生的接收器。在我们的示例中，我们直接控制了调用者和接收者，因此我们可以通过调用其 addIceCandidate() 方法将候选者直接添加到接收者中。这由 handleCallerIceEvent() 处理：

trans-unit.source: When the calling RTCPeerConnection begins to receive media (after the microphone's stream is added to it), a negotiationneeded event is delivered to the caller, letting it know that it's time to start negotiating the connection with the receiver. As previously mentioned, our example is simplified somewhat because we control both the caller and the receiver, so handleCallerNegotiationNeeded() is able to quickly construct the connection by chaining the required calls together for both the caller and receiver, as shown below.
trans-unit.target: 当调用 RTCPeerConnection 开始接收媒体时（在将麦克风的流添加到其中之后），将需要 negotiationneeded 事件传递给调用者，让它知道是时候开始与接收者协商连接了。如前所述，我们的示例有所简化，因为我们可以控制调用者和接收者，因此 handleCallerNegotiationNeeded() 可以通过将调用者和接收者所需的调用链接在一起来快速构建连接，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: When the connection is opened network. If the transport layer reports an error and the connection establishment is started again, the last connection establishment end time is given. If a persistent connection is used, the value will be the same as PerformanceTiming.fetchStart. A connection is considered as opened when all secure connection handshake, or SOCKS authentication, is terminated.

trans-unit.source: When the device proximity sensor detects a change between the device and an object, it notifies the browser of that change. When the browser gets such a notification, it fires a DeviceProximityEvent for any change, and a UserProximityEvent event in the case of a more rough change.

trans-unit.source: When the element does not have a first child, then firstChild is null. The element is still appended to the parent, after the last child. trans-unit.source: When the observer (callback) is invoked, the callback's parameters include a performance observer entry list that contains only observedperformance entries. That is, the list contains entries only for the event types that were specified when the observer's observe() method was invoked. The performance observer entry list interface has the same three getEntries*() methods as the Performance interface. However, note there is one key difference with these methods; the performance observer entry list versions are used to retrieve observed performance entries within the observer callback.
trans-unit.target: 调用观察者（回调）时，回调的参数包括 performance observer entry list ，该列表仅包含观察到的 performance entries 。也就是说，该列表仅包含调用观察者的 observe() 方法时指定的事件类型的条目。在 performance observer entry list 接口具有相同的三个 getEntries*() 方法作为 Performance 接口。但是，请注意，这些方法有一个主要区别。在 performance observer entry list 版本用于检索观察的观察者回调中表现的条目。

trans-unit.source: When the offer arrives, the callee's handleVideoOfferMsg() function is called with the "video-offer" message that was received. This function needs to do two things. First, it needs to create its own RTCPeerConnection and add the tracks containing the audio and video from its microphone and webcam to that. Second, it needs to process the received offer, constructing and sending its answer.
trans-unit.target: 当报价到达时，将使用收到的 "video-offer" 消息来调用被叫方的 handleVideoOfferMsg() 函数。此功能需要做两件事。首先，它需要创建自己的 RTCPeerConnection 并将包含来自其麦克风和网络摄像头的音频和视频的轨道添加到该轨道。其次，它需要处理收到的报价，构造并发送其答案。

trans-unit.source: When the port is started, both scripts post messages to the worker and handle messages sent from it using port.postMessage() and port.onmessage, respectively:
trans-unit.target: 启动端口后，两个脚本都将消息发布到工作器，并分别使用 port.postMessage() 和 port.onmessage 处理从其发送的消息：

trans-unit.source: When the preview video begins to play, we know there's media to record, so we respond by calling the startRecording() function we created earlier, passing in the preview video stream (as the source media to be recorded) and recordingTimeMS as the number of milliseconds of media to record. As mentioned before, startRecording() returns a Promise whose resolution handler is called (receiving as input an array of Blob objects containing the chunks of recorded media data) once recording has completed.
trans-unit.target: 当预览视频开始播放时，我们知道有要记录的媒体，因此我们通过调用之前创建的 startRecording() 函数进行响应，将预览视频流（作为要记录的源媒体）传入，并把 recordingTimeMS 传递为记录媒体的毫秒数。如前所述，一旦记录完成， startRecording() 将返回一个 Promise ,其分辨率处理程序将被调用（接收包含记录的媒体数据块的 Blob 对象数组作为输入）。

trans-unit.source: When the problem is reported, the user agent may focus the element and change the scrolling position of the document or perform some other action that brings the element to the user's attention. User agents may report more than one constraint violation if this element suffers from multiple problems at once. If the element is not rendered, then the user agent may report the error for the running script instead of notifying the user.
trans-unit.target: 当问题被报告时,用户代理可能会聚焦该元素并改变文档的滚动位置,或者执行一些其他的动作来引起用户的注意。如果这个元素同时存在多个问题,用户代理可以报告一个以上的约束违反。如果该元素没有被渲染,那么用户代理可能会报告运行脚本的错误,而不是通知用户。

trans-unit.source: When the promise is fulfilled, the fulfillment handler receives a value of undefined.
trans-unit.target: 兑现承诺后，履行处理程序将收到 undefined 值。

trans-unit.source: When the prompt for unload terminates on the previous document in the same browsing context. If there is no previous document, this value will be the same as PerformanceTiming.fetchStart.
trans-unit.target: 当卸载提示在同一浏览上下文中的上一个文档终止时。如果没有以前的文档，则此值将与 PerformanceTiming.fetchStart 相同。

trans-unit.source: When the receiver begins to receive media, an event is delivered to the receiver's RTCPeerConnection, receiverPC. As explained in Starting the connection process, the current WebRTC specification uses the track event for this, but some browsers haven't been updated to support this yet, so we also need to handle the addstream event. The handleReceiverTrackEvent() and handleReceiverAddStreamEvent() methods, shown below, handle these.
trans-unit.target: 当接收器开始接收媒体，事件被传递到接收者的 RTCPeerConnection ， receiverPC 。如开始连接过程中所述，当前的WebRTC规范为此使用了 track 事件，但是尚未更新某些浏览器来支持此事件，因此我们还需要处理 addstream 事件。所述 handleReceiverTrackEvent() 和 handleReceiverAddStreamEvent() 方法，如下所示，处理这些。

trans-unit.source: When the receiver's RTCPeerConnection ICE layer comes up with a new candidate to propose, it issues an icecandidate event to receiverPC. The icecandidate event handler's job is to transmit the candidate to the caller. In our example, we are directly controlling both the caller and the receiver, so we can just directly add the candidate to the caller by calling its addIceCandidate() method. That's handled by handleReceiverIceEvent().
trans-unit.target: 当接收者的 RTCPeerConnection ICE层提出一个新的候选者提议时，它会向 receiverPC icecandidate 发出icecandidate事件。该 icecandidate 事件处理程序的工作就是发送候选给调用者。在我们的示例中，我们直接控制了调用者和接收者，因此我们可以通过调用其 addIceCandidate() 方法将候选者直接添加到调用者中。这由 handleReceiverIceEvent() 处理。

trans-unit.source: When the request to open a connection is sent to the network. If the transport layer reports an error and the connection establishment is started again, the last connection establishment start time is given. If a persistent connection is used, the value will be the same as PerformanceTiming.fetchStart.
trans-unit.target: 当打开连接的请求发送到网络时。如果传输层报告错误，并且连接建立再次开始，则给出最后的连接建立开始时间。如果使用持久连接，则该值将与 PerformanceTiming.fetchStart 相同。

trans-unit.target: 安全连接握手开始时。如果不请求此类连接，则返回 0 。

trans-unit.source: When the shift key is pressed, a keydown event is first fired, and the key property value is set to be the string "Shift". As we keep holding this key, the keydown event does not continue to fire repeatedly because it produced no character key.

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the OK button, text entered in the input field is returned. If the user clicks OK without entering any text, an empty string is returned. If the user clicks the Cancel button, this function returns null.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击“确定”按钮时，将返回在输入字段中输入的文本。如果用户单击“确定”而不输入任何文本，则返回一个空字符串。如果用户单击“取消”按钮，则此函数返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the play/pause toggle button while the oscillators aren't playing, the startOscillators() function gets called.
trans-unit.target: 当用户未播放振荡器时，单击播放/暂停切换按钮时，将 startOscillators() 函数。

trans-unit.source: When the user lifts a finger off the surface, a pointerup event is sent. We handle this event by calling the handleEnd() function below. Its job is to draw the last line segment for the touch that ended and remove the touch point from the ongoing touch list.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将手指从表面上抬起时，将发送一个 pointerup 事件。我们通过调用下面的 handleEnd() 函数来处理此事件。它的工作是为结束的触摸绘制最后的线段，并从进行中的触摸列表中删除触摸点。

trans-unit.source: When the user lifts a finger off the surface, a touchend event is sent. We handle this by calling the handleEnd() function below. Its job is to draw the last line segment for each touch that ended and remove the touch point from the ongoing touch list.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将手指从表面抬起时，将发送一个 touchend 事件。我们通过调用下面的 handleEnd() 函数来处理此问题。它的工作是为每个结束的触摸绘制最后的线段，并从进行中的触摸列表中删除触摸点。

trans-unit.source: When the user minimizes the window or switches to another tab, the API sends a visibilitychange event to let listeners know the state of the page has changed. You can detect the event and perform some actions or behave differently. For example, if your web app is playing a video, it can pause the video when the user puts the tab into the background, and resume playback when the user returns to the tab. The user doesn't lose their place in the video, the video's soundtrack doesn't interfere with audio in the new foreground tab, and the user doesn't miss any of the video in the meantime.
trans-unit.target: 当用户最小化窗口或切换到另一个选项卡时，API将发送 visibilitychange 更改事件，以使侦听器知道页面的状态已更改。您可以检测到该事件并执行某些操作或表现不同。例如，如果您的Web应用正在播放视频，则当用户将标签置于后台时，它可以暂停视频，并在用户返回至标签时恢复播放。用户不会在视频中失去自己的位置，视频的配乐不会干扰新“前景”选项卡中的音频，同时用户也不会错过任何视频。

trans-unit.target: 当用户按下“发送”按钮时，将调用我们已建立为按钮 click 事件的处理程序的sendMessage（）方法。该方法很简单：

trans-unit.source: When the user releases the key, the keyup event is sent.
trans-unit.target: 当用户释放键时，将发送 keyup 事件。

trans-unit.source: When the user releases the mouse, the drag and drop operation ends. If the mouse was released over an element that is a valid drop target, that is, one that cancelled the last dragenter or dragover event, and then the drop will be successful, and a drop event will fire at the target. Otherwise, the drag operation is cancelled, and no drop event is fired.
trans-unit.target: 当用户释放鼠标时，拖放操作结束。如果将鼠标释放到一个有效的放置目标元素上，即取消了上一个 dragenter 或 dragover 事件的元素，则放置将成功，并且 drop 事件将在目标上触发。否则，将取消拖动操作，并且不会触发任何 drop 事件。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects a file, the handleFiles() function gets called with a FileList object containing File objects representing the files selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 当用户选择文件时， handleFiles() 函数将被 FileList 对象调用，该FileList对象包含代表用户所选 File 对象。

trans-unit.source: When the value of this property changes a readystatechange event fires on the document object.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性的值更改时，将在 document 对象上触发 readystatechange 事件。

trans-unit.source: When the value of this property changes, the visibilitychange event is sent to the Document.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性的值更改时， visibilitychange 性更改事件将发送到 Document 。

trans-unit.source: When the visibility of the specified element crosses over one of the observer's visibility thresholds (as listed in IntersectionObserver.thresholds, the observer's callback is executed with an IntersectionObserverEntry representing the intersection change which occurred. Note that this design allows multiple elements' intersection changes to be processed by a single call to the callback using an array of IntersectionObserverEntry objects.
trans-unit.target: 当指定元素的可见性超过观察者的可见性阈值之一（如 IntersectionObserver.thresholds 中所列）时，观察者的回调将使用 IntersectionObserverEntry 来表示发生的相交更改。请注意，此设计允许将多个元素的相交更改设为通过使用 IntersectionObserverEntry 对象数组对回调的单个调用来处理。

trans-unit.source: When there is an error caused by calling requestPointerLock() or exitPointerLock(), the pointerlockerror event is dispatched to the document. This is a simple event and contains no extra data.
trans-unit.target: 如果由于调用 requestPointerLock() 或 exitPointerLock() 导致错误，则将 pointerlockerror 事件调度到 document 。这是一个简单的事件，不包含任何额外的数据。

trans-unit.source: When there is no selection, the active element is the page's <body> or null.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有选择，则活动元素为页面的 <body> 或 null 。

trans-unit.source: When these transferable objects are transferred, they are 'neutered' on the previous context — the one they previously belonged to. For instance a port, when is sent, cannot be used anymore by the original context. Note that the only two objects that can currently be transferred are ArrayBuffer and MessagePort.
trans-unit.target: 当这些可转移对象被转移时，它们在先前的上下文中被“抵消”了-它们先前属于该对象。例如，发送端口后，原始上下文将无法再使用该端口。请注意，当前只能传输的两个对象是 ArrayBuffer 和 MessagePort 。

trans-unit.source: When this event is processed, the target's border is set to dashed to provide a clear visual indication the element has received a move event.
trans-unit.target: 处理此事件后，目标的边框将设置为 dashed 以提供清晰的视觉指示，表明元素已接收到移动事件。

trans-unit.source: When this event returns (or sets the returnValue property to) a value other than null or undefined, the user is prompted to confirm the page unload. In some browsers, the return value of the event is displayed in this dialog. Starting with Firefox 44, Chrome 51, Opera 38 and Safari 9.1, a generic string not under the control of the webpage will be shown instead of the returned string. For example, Firefox displays the string "This page is asking you to confirm that you want to leave - data you have entered may not be saved." (See bug 588292), and Chrome displays the string "Do you want to leave this site? Changes you made may not be saved" (see Chrome Platform Status).
trans-unit.target: 当此事件返回（或将 returnValue 属性设置为） null 或 undefined 以外的其他值时，系统将提示用户确认页面卸载。在某些浏览器中，该对话框中显示事件的返回值。从Firefox 44，Chrome 51，Opera 38和Safari 9.1开始，将显示不受网页控制的通用字符串，而不是返回的字符串。例如，Firefox显示字符串“此页面正在要求您确认要离开-输入的数据可能不会保存。” （请参见错误588292），然后Chrome显示字符串“您要离开此网站吗？您所做的更改可能不会保存”（请参阅Chrome平台状态）。

It then sets up an event handler for the click event on the play toggle button and attempts to automatically begin playback by calling playVideo().

trans-unit.source: When time runs out, if there are still tasks left in the list, we call requestIdleCallback() again so that we can continue to process the tasks the next time there's idle time available. If the queue is empty, we set taskHandle to 0 to indicate that we don't have a callback scheduled. That way, we'll know to request a callback next time enqueueTask() is called.
trans-unit.target: 时间用完后，如果列表中还有任务，我们将再次调用 requestIdleCallback() ，以便下次有空闲时间时可以继续处理任务。如果队列为空，则将taskHandle设置为0，以指示我们没有安排回调。这样，我们将知道下次调用 enqueueTask() 时请求回调。

trans-unit.source: When two or more pointer device types are being used concurrently, multiple pointers (one for each pointerType) are considered primary. For example, a touch contact and a mouse cursor moved simultaneously will produce pointers that are both considered primary. If there are multiple primary pointers, these pointers will all produce compatibility mouse events (see Pointer_events for more information about pointer, mouse and touch interaction).
trans-unit.target: 当同时使用两个或多个指针设备类型时，多个指针（每个pointerType一个）被认为是主要的。例如，同时移动的触摸接触和鼠标光标将产生都被视为主要的指针。如果有多个主指针，则这些指针都将产生兼容性鼠标事件（有关指针，鼠标和触摸交互的更多信息，请参见 Pointer_events ）。

trans-unit.source: When two users running Firefox are communicating on a data channel, the message size limit is much larger than when Firefox and Chrome are communicating because Firefox implements a now deprecated technique for sending large messages in multiple SCTP messages, which Chrome does not. Chrome will instead see a series of messages that it believes are complete, and will deliver them to the receiving RTCDataChannel as multiple messages.
trans-unit.target: 当两个运行Firefox的用户通过数据通道进行通信时，消息大小限制比Firefox和Chrome进行通信时要大得多，这是因为Firefox实施了一种现已弃用的技术，该技术可以在多个SCTP消息中发送大消息，而Chrome则没有。Chrome会改为看到它认为已完成的一系列消息，并将它们作为多条消息传递到接收方 RTCDataChannel 。

trans-unit.source: When using the RTCPeerConnection() constructor, we will specify an RTCConfiguration-compliant object providing configuration parameters for the connection. We use only one of these in this example: iceServers. This is an array of objects describing STUN and/or TURN servers for the ICE layer to use when attempting to establish a route between the caller and the callee. These servers are used to determine the best route and protocols to use when communicating between the peers, even if they're behind a firewall or using NAT.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 RTCPeerConnection() 构造函数时，我们将指定一个 RTCConfiguration 兼容对象，为连接提供配置参数。在此示例中，我们仅使用其中之一： iceServers 。这是一组对象，描述了ICE层的STUN和/或TURN服务器，用于在尝试建立呼叫者和被呼叫者之间的路由时使用。这些服务器用于确定对等体之间进行通信时使用的最佳路由和协议，即使它们位于防火墙后面或使用NAT也不例外。

trans-unit.source: When using the inline HTML markup (<body onerror="alert('an error occurred')">), the HTML specification requires arguments passed to onerror to be named event, source, lineno, colno, error. In browsers that have not implemented this requirement, they can still be obtained via arguments[0] through arguments[2].
