trans-unit.source: When working with files, you are looking at either the grabbing the file from an HTMLMediaElement (i.e. an <audio> or <video> element), or you're looking to fetch the file and decode it into a buffer. Both are legitimate ways of working, however, it's more common to use the former when you are working will full-length tracks, and the latter when working with shorter, more sample-like tracks.
trans-unit.target: 使用文件时，您正在查看是从 HTMLMediaElement （即 <audio> 或 <video> 元素）抓取文件，还是正在获取文件并将其解码到缓冲区中。两种方法都是合法的工作方式，但是，在使用全长音轨时，更常见的使用前一种方法；而在处理较短的，更像样本的音轨时，则使用后者。

trans-unit.source: When working with media source extensions, it is likely that you need to condition your assets before you can stream them. This article takes you through the requirements and shows you a toolchain you can use to encode your assets appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 在使用媒体源扩展时,您很可能需要在流媒体之前对您的资产进行调节。本文将带您了解这些要求,并向您展示一个工具链,您可以使用该工具链对您的资产进行适当的编码。

trans-unit.source: When working with the keyboard, focus rings are a handy indicator to help navigating on a page. To draw focus rings on a canvas drawing, the drawFocusIfNeeded property can be used.
trans-unit.target: 使用键盘时，聚焦环是一个方便的指示器，可帮助您浏览页面。要在画布上绘制聚焦环，可以使用 drawFocusIfNeeded 属性。

trans-unit.source: When writing code for the Web with JavaScript, there are a great many APIs available. Below is a list of all the interfaces (that is, types of objects) that you may be able to use while developing your Web app or site.
trans-unit.target: 在使用JavaScript为Web编写代码时,有大量的API可用。下面是所有接口(即对象类型)的列表,您在开发Web应用程序或站点时可能会用到这些接口。

trans-unit.source: When you are using an IIRFilterNode instead of a BiquadFilterNode you are creating the filter yourself, rather than just choosing a pre-programmed type. So you can create a highpass filter, or a lowpass filter, or a more bespoke one. And this is where the IIR filter node is useful — you can create your own if none of the alaready available settings is right for what you want. As well as this, if your audio graph needed a highpass and a bandpass filter within it, you could just use one IIR filter node in place of the two biquad filter nodes you would otherwise need for this.
trans-unit.target: 当您使用 IIRFilterNode 而不是 BiquadFilterNode 时,您将自己创建过滤器，而不仅仅是选择预编程的类型。因此，您可以创建一个高通滤波器，一个低通滤波器或一个定制的滤波器。这就是IIR过滤器节点有用的地方-如果没有可用的可用设置都无法满足您的需求，则可以创建自己的。除此之外，如果您的音频图中需要一个高通滤波器和一个带通滤波器，则可以仅使用一个IIR滤波器节点来代替您否则需要的两个双二阶滤波器节点。

trans-unit.source: When you call stop() on a transceiver, the sender immediately stops sending media and each of its RTP streams are closed using the RTCP"BYE" message. The receiver then stops receiving media; the receiver's track is stopped, and the transceiver's stopped property is set to true.
trans-unit.target: 当您在收发器上调用 stop() 时，发送方立即停止发送媒体，并使用RTCP "BYE" 消息关闭其每个RTP流。接收器然后停止接收媒体；接收器的 track 停止，并且收发器的 stopped 属性设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: When you change the value of direction, an InvalidStateError exception will occur if the connection is closed or the receiver is stopped.
trans-unit.target: 当更改 direction 的值时，如果连接关闭或接收器停止，则会发生 InvalidStateError 异常。

trans-unit.source: When you choose different options, the page is instantly updated; in addition, your choices are stored in localStorage, so that when you leave the page and load it again, later on, your choices are remembered.
trans-unit.target: 当您选择其他选项时，页面会立即更新。此外，您的选择存储在 localStorage 中，因此，当您离开该页面并再次加载它时，以后会记住您的选择。

First, the composed property returns true beause the click event is always able to propagate across shadow boundaries. In the handler for the upgradeneeded event, you should create the object stores needed for this version of the database:

trans-unit.source: When you create a script–whether it's inline in a <script> element or included in the web page by means of a script loading instruction–you can immediately begin using the API for the document or window elements to manipulate the document itself or to get at the children of that document, which are the various elements in the web page. Your DOM programming may be something as simple as the following, which displays an alert message by using the alert() function from the window object, or it may use more sophisticated DOM methods to actually create new content, as in the longer example below.
trans-unit.target: 创建脚本时-无论是内嵌在 <script> 元素中还是通过脚本加载说明包含​​在网页中-您都可以立即开始使用 document 或 window 元素的API 来操纵文档本身或获取在该文档的子级中，它们是网页中的各种元素。您的DOM编程可能很简单，如下所示，它通过使用 window 对象中的 alert() 函数显示警告消息，或者它可以使用更复杂的DOM方法实际创建新内容，如下面的较长示例所示。

trans-unit.source: When you first create a WebGL context, the size of the viewport will match the size of the canvas. However, if you resize the canvas, you will need to tell the WebGL context a new viewport setting. In this situation, you can use gl.viewport.
trans-unit.target: 首次创建WebGL上下文时，视口的大小将与画布的大小匹配。但是，如果调整画布的大小，则需要告诉WebGL上下文新的视口设置。在这种情况下，可以使用 gl.viewport 。

trans-unit.source: When you pass a method to setInterval() or any other function, it is invoked with the wrong this value. This problem is explained in detail in the JavaScript reference.
trans-unit.target: 将方法传递给 setInterval() 或任何其他函数时，将使用错误的 this 值调用该方法。此问题在JavaScript参考中进行了详细说明。

trans-unit.source: When you pass a method to setTimeout() (or any other function, for that matter), it will be invoked with a this value that may differ from your expectation. This issue is explained in detail in the JavaScript reference.
trans-unit.target: 当您将方法传递给 setTimeout() （或其他任何函数）时，将使用可能不同于您期望的 this 值调用该方法。此问题在JavaScript参考中进行了详细说明。

trans-unit.target: 要删除属性时，可以使用delete运算符。

trans-unit.source: When you want to stop sending messages down the channel, you can invoke MessagePort.close to close the ports.
trans-unit.target: 当您要停止通过该通道发送消息时，可以调用 MessagePort.close 来关闭端口。

trans-unit.source: When you wish to provide your own certificates for use by an RTCPeerConnection instead of having the RTCPeerConnection generate them automatically, you do so through calls to RTCPeerConnection.generateCertificate().
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望提供自己的证书供 RTCPeerConnection 使用，而不是让 RTCPeerConnection 自动生成，请通过调用 RTCPeerConnection.generateCertificate() 来进行。

trans-unit.source: When you've finished using the WebSocket connection, call the WebSocket method close():
trans-unit.target: 使用完WebSocket连接后，请调用WebSocket方法 close() ：

trans-unit.source: When your page loads, it might have a non-null state object. This can happen, for example, if the page sets a state object (using pushState() or replaceState()) and then the user restarts their browser. When your page reloads, the page will receive an onload event, but no popstate event. However, if you read the history.state property, you'll get back the state object you would have gotten if a popstate had fired.
trans-unit.target: 页面加载时，它可能具有非空状态对象。例如，如果页面设置了状态对象（使用 pushState() 或 replaceState() ），然后用户重新启动浏览器，则可能会发生这种情况。页面重新加载时，页面将收到一个onload事件，但没有popstate事件。但是，如果您读取了history.state属性，则将获得如果popstate被触发将获得的状态对象。

trans-unit.source: When your web app changes in such a way that a version change is required for your database, you need to consider what happens if the user has the old version of your app open in one tab and then loads the new version of your app in another. When you call open() with a greater version than the actual version of the database, all other open databases must explicitly acknowledge the request before you can start making changes to the database (an onblocked event is fired until they are closed or reloaded). Here's how it works:
trans-unit.target: 当您的Web应用程序更改为数据库需要版本更改的方式时，您需要考虑如果用户在一个选项卡中打开了旧版本的应用程序，然后在另一个选项卡中加载了新版本的应用程序会发生什么情况。当您以比数据库的实际版本更高的版本调用 open() 时，所有其他打开的数据库都必须显式确认该请求，然后才能开始对数据库进行更改（会触发 onblocked 事件，直到关闭或重新加载它们为止）。运作方式如下：

trans-unit.source: Whenever a new value is assigned to the location object, a document will be loaded using the URL as if location.assign() had been called with the modified URL. Note that security settings, like CORS, may prevent this to effectively happen.
trans-unit.target: 每当将新值分配给位置对象时，都将使用URL加载文档，就像使用修改后的URL调用 location.assign() 一样。请注意，安全设置（例如CORS）可能会阻止这种情况的发生。

trans-unit.target: 每当目标达到为 IntersectionObserver 指定的阈值时，就会调用该回调。回调接收 IntersectionObserverEntry 对象和观察者的列表：

trans-unit.source: Whenever this value decreases to fall to or below the value specified in the bufferedAmountLowThreshold property, the user agent fires the bufferedamountlow event. This event may be used, for example, to implement code which queues more messages to be sent whenever there's room to buffer them.
trans-unit.target: 每当此值减小到等于或小于 bufferedAmountLowThreshold 属性中指定的值时，用户代理就会触发 bufferedamountlow 事件。例如，可以使用此事件来实现代码，该代码将在有缓冲空间的时候将更多消息排队。

trans-unit.source: Whenever you move the mouse, this example checks whether the cursor is in a circular Path2D path. If yes, the circle becomes green, otherwise it is red.
trans-unit.target: 每当您移动鼠标时，此示例都会检查光标是否在圆形 Path2D 路径中。如果是，则圆圈变为绿色，否则为红色。

trans-unit.source: Whenever you move the mouse, this example checks whether the cursor is in the stroke of an elliptical Path2D path. If yes, the ellipse's stroke becomes green, otherwise it is red.
trans-unit.target: 每当您移动鼠标时，此示例都会检查光标是否在椭圆 Path2D 路径的笔触中。如果是，则椭圆的笔触变为绿色，否则为红色。

trans-unit.source: Whether a device uses hardware or software decoding impacts how smooth and power efficient the video decoding is and how efficient the playback will be. The Media Capabilities API enables determining which codecs are supported and how performant a media file will be both in terms of smoothness and power efficiency.
trans-unit.target: 设备使用硬件还是软件解码会影响到视频解码的流畅度和功耗,以及播放的效率。通过媒体能力API可以确定支持哪些编解码器,以及媒体文件在流畅度和能效方面的表现。

trans-unit.source: Whether an event can be canceled or not is something that's determined when that event is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 一个事件是否可以取消,是在该事件初始化时决定的。

trans-unit.source: Whether the mouse coordinates are within a particular area on the canvas, is a common problem to solve. The hit region API allows you to define an area of your canvas and provides another possibility to expose interactive content on a canvas to accessibility tools. It allows you to make hit detection easier and lets you route events to DOM elements. The API has the following three methods (which are still experimental in current web browsers; check the browser compatibility tables).
trans-unit.target: 鼠标坐标是否在画布上的特定区域内,是一个需要解决的常见问题。命中区域API允许您定义画布的一个区域,并提供了另一种可能性,将画布上的交互式内容暴露给可访问性工具。它允许您使点击检测更容易,并允许您将事件路由到DOM元素。该API有以下三种方法(在当前的网络浏览器中还处于试验阶段,请查看浏览器兼容性表)。

trans-unit.source: Which of the two functions, onsuccess() or onerror(), gets called? If everything succeeds, a success event (that is, a DOM event whose type property is set to "success") is fired with request as its target. Once it is fired, the onsuccess() function on request is triggered with the success event as its argument. Otherwise, if there was any problem, an error event (that is, a DOM event whose type property is set to "error") is fired at request. This triggers the onerror() function with the error event as its argument.
trans-unit.target: onsuccess() 或 onerror() 这两个函数中的哪个被调用？如果一切都成功，则以 request 为 target 触发成功事件（即，其 type 属性设置为 "success" 的DOM事件）。一旦触发， onsuccess() 成功事件作为其参数触发 request 的onsuccess（）函数。否则，如果存在任何问题，则会在 request 上引发错误事件（即，其 type 属性设置为 "error" 的DOM事件）。这会以错误事件作为参数触发 onerror() 函数。

trans-unit.source: While
trans-unit.target: While

trans-unit.source: While addEventListener() will let you add the same listener more than once for the same type if the options are different, the only option removeEventListener() checks is the capture/useCapture flag. Its value must match for removeEventListener() to match, but the other values don't.
trans-unit.target: 虽然 addEventListener() 将让你添加相同的侦听不止一次为同一类型，如果选项是不同的，唯一的选择 removeEventListener() 检查是 capture / useCapture 标志。它的值必须匹配， removeEventListener() 才能匹配，但其他值不匹配。

trans-unit.source: While self.skipWaiting() can be called at any point during the service worker's execution, it will only have an effect if there's a newly installed service worker that might otherwise remain in the waiting state. Therefore, it's common to call self.skipWaiting() from inside of an InstallEvent handler.
trans-unit.target: 尽管 self.skipWaiting() 可以在服务程序执行期间随时调用，但是只有在新安装的服务程序可能保持 waiting 状态的情况下，它才会起作用。因此，通常从 InstallEvent 处理程序内部调用 self.skipWaiting() 。

trans-unit.source: While textContent gets the content of all elements, including <script> and <style> elements, innerText does not, only showing “human-readable” elements.
trans-unit.target: 虽然 textContent 获取所有元素的内容，包括 <script> 和 <style> 元素，但 innerText 却不显示，仅显示“人类可读”元素。

trans-unit.source: While RTP is intended for use in latency-critical scenarios, it doesn't inherently offer any features that ensure QoS. Instead, it only offers the information necessary to allow QoS to be implemented elsewhere in the stack.
trans-unit.target: 虽然RTP旨在用于延迟关键型场景,但它本身并不提供任何确保QoS的功能。相反,它只提供必要的信息,以便在堆栈的其他地方实现QoS。

trans-unit.source: While a VRDisplay is blurred it does not lose it’s presenting status (VRDisplay.isPresenting continues to report true) but VRDisplay.getFrameData() returns false without updating the provided VRFrameData and VRDisplay.getPose() returns a VRPose with null members.
trans-unit.target: 当 VRDisplay 模糊时，它不会丢失其当前状态（ VRDisplay.isPresenting 继续报告 true ），但是 VRDisplay.getFrameData() 返回 false 而不更新提供的 VRFrameData ， VRDisplay.getPose() 返回具有 null 成员的 VRPose 。

trans-unit.source: While creating a CustomEvent object, you must create the object from the same window. The detail attribute of your CustomEvent will be subjected to the same restrictions. String and Array values will be readable by the content without restrictions, but custom Objects will not. While using a custom Object, you will need to define the attributes of that object that are readable from the content script using Components.utils.cloneInto().
trans-unit.target: 创建CustomEvent对象时，必须从同一window创建该对象。CustomEvent 的 detail 属性将受到相同的限制。内容可以读取字符串和数组值，而没有限制，但自定义对象则不能。使用自定义对象时，您需要使用Components.utils.cloneInto（）定义可从内容脚本读取的该对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: While handling an asynchronous request, the value of responseText always has the current content received from the server, even if it's incomplete because the data has not been completely received yet.
trans-unit.target: 在处理异步请求时， responseText 的值始终具有从服务器接收的当前内容，即使它是不完整的，因为尚未完全接收到数据。

trans-unit.source: While iframes work by default, "sandboxed" iframes block Pointer lock. The ability to avoid this limitation, in the form of the attribute/value combination <iframe sandbox="allow-pointer-lock">, is expected to appear in Chrome soon.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，iframe可以运行，但“沙盒” iframe会阻止指针锁定。可以通过属性/值组合 <iframe sandbox="allow-pointer-lock"> 的形式来避免这种限制的功能很快就会出现在Chrome中。

trans-unit.source: While information about a user's cameras and microphones are inaccessible for privacy reasons, an application can request the camera and microphone capabilities it needs and wants, using additional constraints. The following expresses a preference for 1280x720 camera resolution:
trans-unit.target: 虽然由于隐私原因,用户的摄像头和麦克风的信息是无法获取的,但应用程序可以使用额外的限制条件来要求它需要和想要的摄像头和麦克风功能。下面表达了对1280x720摄像头分辨率的偏好。

trans-unit.source: While slightly painful when initially working with scalable 2D graphics, paying attention to the pixel grid and the position of paths ensures that your drawings will look correct regardless of scaling or any other transformations involved. A 1.0-width vertical line drawn at the correct position will become a crisp 2-pixel line when scaled up by 2, and will appear at the correct position.
trans-unit.target: 虽然在最初使用可缩放的二维图形时略显痛苦,但注意像素网格和路径的位置可以确保你的图纸看起来正确,无论缩放或涉及任何其他转换。在正确的位置上绘制的1.0宽度的垂直线在放大2后会变成一条清晰的2像素线,并且会出现在正确的位置上。

trans-unit.source: While the label property doesn't have to be unique, this ID number is guaranteed to be unique among all data channels. trans-unit.source: While the WebRTC specification is relatively stable, not all browsers have fully implemented all of its features. In addition, some browsers still have prefixes on some or all WebRTC APIs. While you can manually code around these issues, there is an easier way. The WebRTC organization provides on GitHub the WebRTC adapter to work around compatibility issues in different browsers' WebRTC implementations. The adapter is a JavaScript shim which lets your code to be written to the specification so that it will "just work" in all browsers with WebRTC support. There's no need to conditionally use prefixed APIs or implement other workarounds.
trans-unit.target: 尽管WebRTC 规范相对稳定，但并非所有浏览器都完全实现了其所有功能。此外，某些浏览器在某些或所有WebRTC API上仍具有前缀。尽管您可以手动编码这些问题，但是有一种更简单的方法。 WebRTC组织在GitHub上提供WebRTC适配器，以解决不同浏览器的WebRTC实现中的兼容性问题。适配器是JavaScript填充程序，可让您将代码写入规范，以便在支持WebRTC的所有浏览器中“正常工作”。无需有条件地使用带前缀的API或实现其他解决方法。

trans-unit.source: While the WebRTC specification is relatively stable, not all browsers have fully implemented all of its features. In addition, some browsers still have prefixes on some or all WebRTC APIs. While you can manually code around these issues, there is an easier way. The WebRTC organization provides on GitHub the WebRTC adapter to work around compatibility issues in different browsers' WebRTC implementations. The adapter is a JavaScript shim which lets your code to be written to the specification so that it will "just work" in all browsers with WebRTC support. There's no need to conditionally use prefixed APIs or implement other workarounds.

While the article Using the MediaStream Recording API demonstrates using the MediaRecorder interface to capture a MediaStream generated by a hardware device, as returned by navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia(), you can also use an HTML media element (namely <audio> or <video>) as the source of the MediaStream to be recorded. In this article, we'll look at an example that does just that.
trans-unit.target: 尽管使用MediaStream Recording API的文章演示了如何使用 MediaRecorder 接口捕获由硬件设备生成的 MediaStream navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia() 由navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia（）返回），但是您也可以使用HTML媒体元素（即 <audio> 或 <video> ）作为要记录的 MediaStream 的源。在本文中，我们将看一个示例。

trans-unit.source: Why, you may wonder, is something fundamental to the process of establishing a WebRTC connection left out of the specification? The answer is simple: since the two devices have no way to directly contact each other, and the specification can’t predict every possible use case for WebRTC, it makes more sense to let the developer select an appropriate networking technology and messaging protocol.
trans-unit.target: 您可能会奇怪，为什么在规范中没有建立WebRTC连接的基础知识呢？答案很简单：由于这两种设备无法直接相互联系，并且规范无法预测WebRTC的每种可能的使用情况，因此让开发人员选择适当的联网技术和消息传递协议更为有意义。

trans-unit.source: With Media Source Extensions (MSE), this is changing. MSE allows us to replace the usual single track src value fed to media elements with a reference to a MediaSource object, which is a container for information like the ready state of the media for being played, and references to multiple SourceBuffer objects that represent the different chunks of media that make up the entire stream. MSE gives us finer grained control over how much and how often content is fetched, and some control over memory usage details, such as when buffers are evicted. It lays the groundwork for adaptive bitrate streaming clients (such as those using DASH or HLS) to be built on its extensible API.
trans-unit.target: 使用媒体源扩展（MSE），这种情况正在改变。 MSE允许我们使用对 MediaSource 对象的引用来替换馈送给媒体元素的通常的单轨 src 值，该对象是诸如信息的容器的状态，如要播放的媒体的就绪状态，以及对表示不同内容的多个 SourceBuffer 对象的引用组成整个流的大量媒体。 MSE为我们提供了对内容的获取数量和频率的更精细控制，以及对内存使用情况详细信息的某些控制，例如何时驱逐缓冲区。它为在其可扩展API上构建自适应比特率流客户端（例如使用DASH或HLS的客户端）奠定了基础。

trans-unit.source: With Streams being available to JavaScript, this all changes — you can now start processing raw data with JavaScript bit by bit as soon as it is available on the client-side, without needing to generate a buffer, string, or blob.
trans-unit.target: 随着Streams可用于JavaScript，所有这些都发生了变化—现在，您就可以开始在客户端上使用JavaScript一点一点地开始处理原始数据，而无需生成缓冲区，字符串或Blob。

trans-unit.source: With animations, use window.requestAnimationFrame() instead of window.setInterval() .
trans-unit.target: 对于动画，请使用 window.requestAnimationFrame() 而不是 window.setInterval() 。

trans-unit.source: With chrome privileges, the property is read-write, otherwise it is read-only. Bear in mind that if you try to set this property without chrome privileges, it will not throw an exception and instead just silently fail. This is to prevent scripts designed to set this property in Internet Explorer from breaking.
trans-unit.target: 如果有chrome权限,这个属性是可读可写的,否则就是只读。请记住,如果你试图在没有chrome权限的情况下设置这个属性,它不会抛出一个异常,而只是默默地失败。这是为了防止在Internet Explorer中设置此属性的脚本被破坏。

trans-unit.source: With each new circle, the opacity of the previous circles underneath is effectively increased. If we were to increase the step count (and thus draw more circles), the background would eventually disappear completely from the center of the image.
trans-unit.target: 每画一个新的圆,下面的前一个圆的不透明度就会有效增加。如果我们要增加步数(从而画出更多的圆),背景最终会从图像中心完全消失。

trans-unit.source: With our presentation request successful, we now want to start setting up to render content to present to the VRDisplay. First of all we set the canvas to the same size as the VR display area. We do this by getting the VREyeParameters for both eyes using VRDisplay.getEyeParameters().
trans-unit.target: 成功完成演示请求后，我们现在要开始设置以呈现要呈现给VRDisplay的内容。首先，我们将画布设置为与VR显示区域相同的大小。我们通过使用 VRDisplay.getEyeParameters() 获得两只眼睛的 VREyeParameters 来做到这一点。

trans-unit.source: With service workers, the following steps are generally observed for basic set up:
trans-unit.target: 对于服务人员,一般遵守以下步骤进行基本设置。

trans-unit.source: With some payment handlers (e.g., Apple Pay), dispatched whenever the user changes payment instrument, like switching from a credit card to a debit card.
trans-unit.target: 对于一些支付处理程序(如Apple Pay),每当用户更换支付工具时,如从信用卡切换到借记卡,就会被派发。

trans-unit.source: With some payment handlers (e.g., Apple Pay), this event handler is called to handle the merchantvalidation event, which is dispatched when the user agent requires that the merchant validate that the merchant or vendor requesting payment is legitimate.
trans-unit.target: 对于某些付款处理程序（例如Apple Pay），将调用此事件处理程序来处理 merchantvalidation 事件，该事件在用户代理要求商人验证请求付款的商人或卖方合法时分派。

trans-unit.source: With tabbed browsing, there is a reasonable chance that any given webpage is in the background and thus not visible to the user. The Page Visibility API provides events you can watch for to know when a document becomes visible or hidden, as well as features to look at the current visibility state of the page.
trans-unit.target: 通过标签式浏览,任何给定的网页都有可能在后台,因此用户不可见。页面可见性API提供了你可以观察的事件,以了解文档何时变得可见或隐藏,以及查看页面当前可见性状态的功能。

trans-unit.target: 考虑到这些,我们来看看用Web Audio API创建IIR过滤器的代码。

trans-unit.target: 有了这个，我们将 font 设置为高50像素的“ serif”（用户的默认衬线字体），然后调用 strokeText() 从坐标（50，90）开始绘制文本“ Hello world”。

trans-unit.source: With the "Include local directory pass when uploading files to a server" option enabled, IE will change the filename inside the Blob on the fly. To have direct control of the sent filename, the developer should send the filename as the third parameter value, i.e. formData.append(name, value, filename).
trans-unit.target: 启用“在将文件上传到服务器时包括本地目录传递”选项后，IE会即时更改 Blob 内部的文件名。为了直接控制发送的文件名，开发人员应将文件名作为第三个参数值发送，即 formData.append(name, value, filename) 。

trans-unit.source: With the dragenter and dragover event, the dropEffect property is initialized to the effect that the user is requesting. The user can modify the desired effect by pressing modifier keys. Although the exact keys used vary by platform, typically the Shift and Control keys would be used to switch between copying, moving, and linking. The mouse pointer will change to indicate which operation is desired; for instance, for a copy, the cursor might appear with a plus sign next to it.
trans-unit.target: 通过 dragenter 和 dragover 事件，将 dropEffect 属性初始化为用户正在请求的效果。用户可以通过按修改键来修改所需的效果。尽管所使用的确切键因平台而异，但通常会使用Shift和Control键在复制，​​移动和链接之间进行切换。鼠标指针将更改以指示所需的操作。例如，对于副本，光标可能会出现在其旁边并带有加号。

trans-unit.source: With the IIRFIlter node it's up to you to set what feedforward and feedback values the filter needs — this determines the characteristics of the filter. The downside is that this involves some complex maths.
trans-unit.target: 使用IIRFIlter节点，您可以设置滤波器需要的 feedforward 和 feedback 值-这决定了滤波器的特性。缺点是，这涉及一些复杂的数学运算。

trans-unit.source: With the Web Animations API, all you need to change is just one little property!
trans-unit.target: 有了Web Animations API,你所需要改变的只是一个小的属性。

trans-unit.source: With the Web Animations API, we can move interactive animations from stylesheets to JavaScript, separating presentation from behavior. We no longer need to rely on DOM-heavy techniques such as writing CSS properties and scoping classes onto elements to control playback direction. And unlike pure, declarative CSS, JavaScript also lets us dynamically set values from properties to durations. For building custom animation libraries and creating interactive animations, the Web Animations API might be the perfect tool for the job. Let's see what it can do!
trans-unit.target: 有了Web Animations API,我们可以将交互式动画从样式表转移到JavaScript中,将表现与行为分离。我们不再需要依赖DOM重技术,如编写CSS属性和在元素上设置范围类来控制播放方向。而且与纯粹的声明式CSS不同,JavaScript还能让我们从属性到持续时间动态地设置值。对于构建自定义动画库和创建交互式动画,Web Animations API可能是最完美的工具。让我们来看看它能做什么吧!

trans-unit.source: With the association in place between the vertex buffer for our shape and the aVertexPosition attribute used to deliver vertexes one by one into the vertex shader, we're ready to draw the shape by calling drawArrays().
trans-unit.target: 有了形状的顶点缓冲区和用于将顶点一一传递到顶点着色器中的 aVertexPosition 属性之间的关联，我们就可以通过调用 drawArrays() 来绘制形状了。

trans-unit.source: With the association in place between the vertex buffer for our shape and the aVertexPosition attribute used to deliver vertexes one by one into the vertex shader, we're ready to draw the shape by calling drawArrays().

trans-unit.source: With the built-in popup blockers of Mozilla/Firefox and Internet Explorer 6 SP2, you have to check the return value of window.open(): it will be null if the window wasn't allowed to open. However, for most other popup blockers, there is no reliable way.
trans-unit.target: 使用Mozilla / Firefox和Internet Explorer 6 SP2的内置弹出窗口阻止程序，您必须检查 window.open() 的返回值：如果不允许打开窗口，则它将为 null 。但是，对于大多数其他弹出窗口阻止程序，没有可靠的方法。

trans-unit.source: With the chunks encoded, we then call Array/forEach on the resulting array. Inside this block we use WritableStreamDefaultWriter.ready to check whether the writer is ready to have another chunk written to it. ready returns a promise that fulfills when this is the case, inside of which we call WritableStreamDefaultWriter.write() to actually write the chunk to the stream. This also triggers the write() method specified inside the WritableStream() constructor, as discussed above.
trans-unit.target: 对块进行编码后，然后在结果数组上调用 Array/forEach 。在此块内，我们使用 WritableStreamDefaultWriter.ready 检查编写器是否准备好向其写入另一个块。在这种情况下， ready 将返回一个诺言，该诺言将实现，在其中，我们调用 WritableStreamDefaultWriter.write() 以将块实际写入流中。如上所述，这还会触发 WritableStream() 构造函数内部指定的 write() 方法。

trans-unit.source: With the help of this extension, you can now set the magnification or minification filter in the WebGLRenderingContext.texParameter() method to one of gl.LINEAR, gl.LINEAR_MIPMAP_NEAREST, gl.NEAREST_MIPMAP_LINEAR, or gl.LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR, and use floating-point textures.

trans-unit.source: With the help of this extension, you can now set the magnification or minification filter in the WebGLRenderingContext.texParameter() method to one of gl.LINEAR, gl.LINEAR_MIPMAP_NEAREST, gl.NEAREST_MIPMAP_LINEAR, or gl.LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR, and use half floating-point textures.
trans-unit.target: 借助此扩展，您现在可以将 WebGLRenderingContext.texParameter() 方法中的放大或缩小过滤器设置为 gl.LINEAR ， gl.LINEAR_MIPMAP_NEAREST ， gl.NEAREST_MIPMAP_LINEAR 或 gl.LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR 之一，并使用半浮点数纹理。

trans-unit.source: With the index of the vertex position attribute now available in aVertexPosition, we call enableVertexAttribArray() to enable the position attribute so it can be used by the shader program (in particular, by the vertex shader).
trans-unit.target: 现在在 aVertexPosition 中可以使用顶点位置属性的索引，我们调用 enableVertexAttribArray() 来启用position属性，以便着色器程序（尤其是顶点着色器）可以使用它。

trans-unit.source: With the key generator, the key would be generated automatically as you add the value to the object store. The current number of a key generator is always set to 1 when the object store for that key generator is first created. Basically the newly auto-generated key is increased by 1 based on the previous key. The current number for a key generator never decreases, other than as a result of database operations being reverted, for example, the database transaction is aborted. Therefore deleting a record or even clearing all records from an object store never affects the object store's key generator.
trans-unit.target: 有了密钥生成器,当你向对象存储中添加值时,密钥将自动生成。当第一次创建密钥生成器的对象存储时,密钥生成器的当前编号总是设置为1。基本上,新自动生成的密钥会在之前的密钥基础上增加1。除了数据库操作被还原的结果,比如数据库事务被中止,键生成器的当前编号永远不会减少。因此从对象存储中删除一条记录,甚至清除所有记录,都不会影响对象存储的密钥生成器。

trans-unit.source: With the structure of the site defined, we turn to the styling for the site. Let's look at the style for each component of the page individually.

trans-unit.source: With the target element in hand, we set the scrollTop of the frame's scrollingElement to the offsetTop of the target element. By doing so, we set the vertical scrolling position of the frame's document so that it's the same as the top edge of the target element.
trans-unit.target: 有了目标元素，我们将框架的 scrollingElement 的 scrollTop 设置为目标元素的 offsetTop 。这样，我们设置框架文档的垂直滚动位置，使其与目标元素的顶部边缘相同。

trans-unit.target: 在用户通过提示的允许下，打开系统上的摄像头或屏幕共享和/或麦克风，并提供包含视频轨和/或音频轨的 MediaStream 以及输入。

trans-unit.source: Within a web page, there are certain cases where a default drag behavior is used. These include text selections, images, and links. When an image or link is dragged, the URL of the image or link is set as the drag data, and a drag begins. For other elements, they must be part of a selection for a default drag to occur. To see this in effect, select an area of a webpage, and then click and hold the mouse and drag the selection. An OS-specific rendering of the selection will appear and follow the mouse pointer as the drag occurs. However, this behavior is only the default drag behavior, if no listeners adjust the data to be dragged.
trans-unit.target: 在网页中,有些情况下会使用默认的拖动行为,包括文本选择、图像和链接。这些情况包括文本选择、图像和链接。当图像或链接被拖动时,图像或链接的 URL 被设置为拖动数据,然后开始拖动。对于其他元素,它们必须是选择的一部分,才会发生默认拖动。要查看这种效果,请选择网页的一个区域,然后单击并按住鼠标,拖动选区。当拖动发生时,会出现一个特定操作系统的选区渲染,并跟随鼠标指针移动。但是,如果没有监听器调整要拖动的数据,这种行为只是默认的拖动行为。

trans-unit.source: Workers are considered to have their own execution context, distinct from the document that created them. For this reason they are, in general, not governed by the content security policy of the document (or parent worker) that created them. So for example, suppose a document is served with the following header:
trans-unit.target: 工人被认为具有自己的执行上下文，与创建它们的文档不同。因此，它们通常不受创建它们的文档（或父级工作人员）的内容安全策略的约束。因此，例如，假设文档带有以下标头：

trans-unit.source: Workers are mainly useful for allowing your code to perform processor-intensive calculations without blocking the user interface thread. In this example, a worker is used to calculate Fibonacci numbers.
trans-unit.target: Worker主要用于允许您的代码在不阻塞用户界面线程的情况下执行处理器密集型计算。在这个例子中,一个 Worker 被用来计算斐波那契数。

trans-unit.source: Workers can also create a new URL using the URL() constructor and call any normal method on the returned object.
trans-unit.target: 工作者还可以使用 URL() 构造函数创建新的URL，并在返回的对象上调用任何常规方法。

trans-unit.source: Workers can use the static methods URL.createObjectURL and URL.revokeObjectURL with Blob objects accesible to the worker.
trans-unit.target: 工作人员可以将静态方法URL.createObjectURL和URL.revokeObjectURL与工作人员可以访问的 Blob 对象一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Workers may in turn spawn new workers as long as those workers are hosted within the same origin as the parent page (Note: nested workers are currently not implemented in WebKit). In addition workers may use XMLHttpRequest for network I/O, with the stipulation that the responseXML and channel attributes on XMLHttpRequest always return null.
trans-unit.target: 工人可以反过来产生新的工人，只要这些工人与父页面位于同一来源内即可。（注意：WebKit中当前未实现嵌套的工人）。另外，工作人员可以将 XMLHttpRequest 用于网络I / O，并规定 XMLHttpRequest 上的 responseXML 和 channel 属性始终返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: Workers may in turn spawn new workers, as long as those workers are hosted within the same origin as the parent page. In addition, workers may use XMLHttpRequest for network I/O, with the exception that the responseXML and channel attributes on XMLHttpRequest always return null.
trans-unit.target: 工人可以反过来产生新的工人，只要这些工人与父页面位于同一来源即可。另外，工作人员可以将 XMLHttpRequest 用于网络I / O，但 XMLHttpRequest 上的 responseXML 和 channel 属性始终返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: Workers may spawn more workers if they wish. So-called sub-workers must be hosted within the same origin as the parent page. Also, the URIs for subworkers are resolved relative to the parent worker's location rather than that of the owning page. This makes it easier for workers to keep track of where their dependencies are.
trans-unit.target: 如果工人愿意,他们可以产生更多的工人。所谓的子 Worker 必须与父页面在同一源头托管。此外,子 Worker 的 URI 是相对于父 Worker 的位置而不是自己页面的位置进行解析的。这使得工作者更容易跟踪他们的依赖关系在哪里。

trans-unit.source: Workers may, in turn, spawn new workers, as long as those workers are hosted within the same origin as the parent page. In addition, workers may use XMLHttpRequest for network I/O, with the exception that the responseXML and channel attributes on XMLHttpRequest always return null.
trans-unit.target: 工人可以反过来产生新的工人，只要这些工人与父页面位于同一来源即可。另外，工作人员可以将 XMLHttpRequest 用于网络I / O，但 XMLHttpRequest 上的 responseXML 和 channel 属性始终返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: Writes an error message to the console if the assertion is false. If the assertion is true, nothing happens.

trans-unit.source: Writing to a document that has already loaded without calling document.open() will automatically call document.open. Once you have finished writing, it is recommended to call document.close() to tell the browser to finish loading the page. The text you write is parsed into the document's structure model. In the example above, the h1 element becomes a node in the document.
trans-unit.target: 在不调用 document.open() 的情况下写入已加载的文档将自动调用 document.open 。完成编写后，建议调用 document.close() 告诉浏览器完成页面加载。您编写的文本将解析到文档的结构模型中。在上面的示例中， h1 元素成为文档中的节点。

trans-unit.source: Writing to the clipboard is available without permission in secure contexts and browser extensions, but only from user-initiated event callbacks. Browser extensions with the "clipboardWrite" permission can write to the clipboard at any time.
trans-unit.target: 在安全上下文和浏览器扩展中，未经许可就可以写入剪贴板，但只能从用户启动的事件回调中进行。具有 "clipboardWrite" 权限的浏览器扩展程序可以随时写入剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: XMLHttpRequest.channel is an nsIChannel that used by the object when performing the request. This is null if the channel hasn't been created yet. In the case of a multi-part request, this is the initial channel, not the different parts in the multi-part request. Requires elevated privileges to access.
trans-unit.target: XMLHttpRequest.channel是对象在执行请求时使用的 nsIChannel 。如果尚未创建通道，则为 null 。对于多部分请求，这是初始通道，而不是多部分请求中的不同部分。需要提升的特权才能访问。
